h4.p: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhakanipātassa ^a^V3.0193^ea^ ^a^M3.0193^ea^ ^a^P4.0068^ea^ paṭhame ^b^āsevitāyā^eb^ti ādarena sevitāya. ^b^bhāvitāyā^eb^ti vaḍḍhitāya. ^b^bahulīkatāyā^eb^ti punappunaṃ katāya. ^b^yānikatāyā^eb^ti yuttayānasadisakatāya. ^b^vatthukatāyā^eb^ti patiṭṭhānaṭṭhena vatthu viya katāya. ^b^anuṭṭhitāyā^eb^ti paccupaṭṭhitāya. ^b^paricitāyā^eb^ti samantato citāya upacitāya. ^b^susamāraddhāyā^eb^ti suṭṭhu samāraddhāya sukatāya. ^b^ānisaṃsā^eb^ti guṇā. ^b^sukhaṃ supatī^eb^tiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ ekādasakanipāte vakkhāma.

[03] ^b^appamāṇa^eb^nti ^a^V3.0194^ea^ pharaṇavasena appamāṇaṃ. ^b^tanū saṃyojanā honti, passato upadhikkhaya^eb^nti mettāpadaṭṭhānāya vipassanāya anukkamena upadhikkhayasaṅkhātaṃ arahattaṃ pattassa dasa saṃyojanā pahīyantīti attho. atha vā ^b^tanū saṃyojanā hontī^eb^ti paṭighañceva paṭighasampayuttasaṃyojanā ca tanukā honti. ^b^passato upadhikkhaya^eb^nti tesaṃyeva kilesūpadhīnaṃ khayasaṅkhātaṃ mettaṃ adhigamavasena passantassa. ^b^kusalī tena hotī^eb^ti tena mettāyanena kusalo hoti. ^b^sattasaṇḍa^eb^nti ^a^P4.0069^ea^ sattasaṅkhātena saṇḍena samannāgataṃ, sattabharitanti attho. ^b^vijetvā^eb^ti adaṇḍena asatthena dhammeneva vijinitvā. ^b^rājisayo^eb^ti isisadisā dhammikarājāno. ^b^yajamānā^eb^ti dānāni dadamānā. ^b^anupariyagā^eb^ti vicariṃsu.

[03] ^b^assamedha^eb^ntiādīsu porāṇakarājakāle kira sassamedhaṃ, purisamedhaṃ, sammāpāsaṃ, vācāpeyyanti cattāri saṅgahavatthūni ahesuṃ, yehi rājāno ^a^M3.0194^ea^ lokaṃ saṅgaṇhiṃsu. tattha nipphannasassato dasamabhāgaggahaṇaṃ ^b^sassamedhaṃ^eb^ nāma, sassasampādane medhāvitāti attho. mahāyodhānaṃ chamāsikaṃ bhattavetanānuppadānaṃ ^b^purisamedhaṃ^eb^ nāma, purisasaṅgaṇhane medhāvitāti attho. daliddamanussānaṃ hatthato lekhaṃ gahetvā tīṇi vassāni vinā vaḍḍhiyā sahassadvisahassamattadhanānuppadānaṃ ^b^sammāpāsaṃ^eb^ nāma. tañhi sammā manusse pāseti hadaye bandhitvā viya ṭhapeti, tasmā sammāpāsanti vuccati. ``tāta, mātulā''tiādinā nayena pana saṇhavācābhaṇanaṃ ^b^vācāpeyyaṃ^eb^ nāma, piyavācāti attho. evaṃ catūhi saṅgahavatthūhi saṅgahitaṃ raṭṭhaṃ iddhañceva hoti, phītañca, bahuannapānaṃ, khemaṃ, nirabbudaṃ. manussā mudā modamānā ure putte naccentā apārutagharā viharanti. idaṃ gharadvāresu aggaḷānaṃ abhāvato ^b^niraggaḷa^eb^nti vuccati. ayaṃ porāṇikā paveṇi.

[03] aparabhāge pana okkākarājakāle brāhmaṇā imāni cattāri ^a^P4.0070^ea^ saṅgahavatthūni imañca raṭṭhasampattiṃ parivattetvā uddhaṃmūlakaṃ katvā ^b^assamedhaṃ purisamedha^eb^ntiādike pañca yaññe nāma akaṃsu. tesu assamettha medhanti vadhentīti ^b^assamedho^eb^. dvīhi pariyaññehi yajitabbassa ekavīsatiyūpassa ekasmiṃ pacchimadivaseyeva sattanavutipañcapasusataghātabhiṃsanassa ṭhapetvā bhūmiñca purise ca avasesasabbavibhavadakkhiṇassa yaññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. purisamettha medhantīti ^b^purisamedho^eb^. catūhi pariyaññehi yajitabbassa saddhiṃ bhūmiyā assamedhe vuttavibhavadakkhiṇassa yaññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. sammamettha pāsantīti ^b^sammāpāso^eb^. divase divase yugacchiggaḷe ^a^V3.0195^ea^ pavesanadaṇḍakasaṅkhātaṃ sammaṃ khipitvā tassa patitokāse vediṃ katvā saṃhārimehi yūpādīhi sarassatīnadiyā nimuggokāsato pabhuti paṭilomaṃ gacchantena yajitabbassa satrayāgassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. vājamettha pivantīti ^b^vājapeyyo^eb^. ekena pariyaññena sattarasahi pasūhi yajitabbassa beluvayūpassa sattarasakadakkhiṇassa yaññassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. natthi ettha aggaḷāti ^b^niraggaḷo^eb^. navahi pariyaññehi yajitabbassa ^a^P4.0071^ea^ saddhiṃ bhūmiyā ca purisehi ca assamedhe vuttavibhavadakkhiṇassa sabbamedhapariyāyanāmassa assamedhavikappassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ.

[03] ^b^kalampi^eb^ ^a^M3.0195^ea^ ^b^te nānubhavanti soḷasi^eb^nti te sabbepi mahāyāgā ekassa mettācittassa vipākamahantatāya soḷasiṃ kalaṃ na agghanti, soḷasamaṃ bhāgaṃ na pāpuṇantīti attho. ^b^na jinātī^eb^ti na attanā parassa jāniṃ karoti. ^b^na jāpaye^eb^ti na parena parassa jāniṃ kāreti. ^b^mettaṃso^eb^ti mettāyamānacittakoṭṭhāso hutvā. ^b^sabbabhūtāna^eb^nti sabbasattesu. ^b^veraṃ tassa na kenacī^eb^ti tassa kenaci saddhiṃ akusalaveraṃ vā puggalaveraṃ vā natthi.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^ādibrahmacariyikāyā^eb^ti maggabrahmacariyassa ādibhūtāya. ^b^paññāyā^eb^ti vipassanāya. ^b^garuṭṭhāniya^eb^nti gāravuppattipaccayabhūtaṃ garubhāvanīyaṃ. ^b^tibba^eb^nti bahalaṃ. ^b^paripucchatī^eb^ti atthapāḷianusandhipubbāparaṃ pucchati. ^b^paripañhatī^eb^ti pañhaṃ karoti, idañcidañca paṭipucchissāmīti vitakketi. ^b^dvayenā^eb^ti duvidhena. ^b^anānākathiko^eb^ti anānattakathiko hoti. ^b^atiracchānakathiko^eb^ti nānāvidhaṃ tiracchānakathaṃ na katheti. ^b^ariyaṃ vā tuṇhībhāva^eb^nti ariyatuṇhībhāvo nāma catutthajjhānaṃ, sesakammaṭṭhānamanasikāropi vaṭṭati. ^b^jānaṃ jānātī^eb^ti jānitabbakaṃ jānāti. ^b^passaṃ passatī^eb^ti passitabbakaṃ passati. ^b^piyattāyā^eb^ti ^a^P4.0072^ea^ piyabhāvatthāya. ^b^garuttāyā^eb^ti garubhāvatthāya. ^b^bhāvanāyā^eb^ti bhāvanatthāya guṇasambhāvanāya vā. ^b^sāmaññāyā^eb^ti samaṇadhammatthāya. ^b^ekībhāvāyā^eb^ti nirantarabhāvatthāya.

[03] 3-4^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^appiyapasaṃsī^eb^ti appiyajanassa pasaṃsako vaṇṇabhāṇī. ^b^piyagarahī^eb^ti piyajanassa ^a^V3.0196^ea^ nindako garahako. catutthe ^b^anavaññattikāmo^eb^ti ``aho vata maṃ aññena avajāneyyu''nti anavajānanakāmo. ^b^akālaññū^eb^ti kathākālaṃ na jānāti, akāle katheti. ^b^asucī^eb^ti asucīhi kāyakammādīhi samannāgato.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ pañcame lokassa dhammāti ^b^lokadhammā^eb^. etehi muttā nāma natthi, buddhānampi honti. tenevāha -- ^b^lokaṃ anuparivattantī^eb^ti anubandhanti nappajahanti ^a^M3.0196^ea^, lokato na nivattantīti attho. ^b^loko ca aṭṭha lokadhamme anuparivattatī^eb^ti ayañca loko ete anubandhati na pajahati, tehi dhammehi na nivattatīti attho.

[03] ^b^lābho alābho^eb^ti lābhe āgate alābho āgatoyevāti veditabbo. ^b^ayasā^eb^dīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^avekkhati vipariṇāmadhamme^eb^ti ``vipariṇāmadhammā ime''ti evaṃ avekkhati. ^b^vidhūpitā^eb^ti ^a^P4.0073^ea^ vidhamitā viddhaṃsitā. ^b^padañca ñatvā^eb^ti nibbānapadaṃ jānitvā. ^b^sammappajānāti bhavassa pāragū^eb^ti bhavassa pāraṃ gato nipphattiṃ matthakaṃ patto, nibbānapadaṃ ñatvāva taṃ pāraṃ gatabhāvaṃ sammappajānātīti. imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ.
[03] 6^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^ko viseso^eb^ti kiṃ visesakāraṇaṃ. ^b^ko adhippayāso^eb^ti ko adhikappayogo. ^b^pariyādāyā^eb^ti gahetvā pariniṭṭhapetvā. idhāpi vaṭṭavivaṭṭameva kathitaṃ.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^acirapakkante^eb^ti saṅghaṃ bhinditvā na cirapakkante. ^b^ārabbhā^eb^ti āgamma paṭicca sandhāya. ^b^attavipatti^eb^nti attano vipattiṃ vipannākāraṃ. sesapadesupi eseva nayo. ^b^abhibhuyyā^eb^ti abhibhavitvā madditvā.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^a^V3.0197^ea^ ^b^vaṭajālikāya^eb^nti evaṃnāmake vihāre. so kira vaṭavane niviṭṭhattā vaṭajālikāti saṅkhaṃ gato. ^b^pāturahosī^eb^ti imamatthaṃ devarañño ārocessāmīti gantvā pākaṭo ahosi. ^b^ādibrahmacariyako^eb^ti sikkhattayasaṅgahassa sakalasāsanabrahmacariyassa ādibhūto.

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^kulaputto^eb^ti jātikulaputto. ^b^balavā^eb^ti thāmasampanno. ^b^pāsādiko^eb^ti ^a^P4.0074^ea^ rūpasampattiyā pasādajanako. ^b^tibbarāgo^eb^ti bahalarāgo. ^b^kimaññatrā^eb^tiādīsu ayamattho -- kiṃ aññena kāraṇena ^a^M3.0197^ea^ kathitena, ayaṃ nando indriyesu guttadvāro bhojane mattaññū jāgariyamanuyutto satisampajaññena samannāgato, yehi nando sakkoti paripuṇṇaṃ parisuddhaṃ brahmacariyaṃ carituṃ. sace imehi kāraṇehi samannāgato nābhavissa, na sakkuṇeyyāti. ^b^itiha tatthā^eb^ti evaṃ tattha. imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭameva kathitaṃ.

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^aññenāññaṃ paṭicaratī^eb^ti aññena kāraṇena vacanena vā aññaṃ kāraṇaṃ vacanaṃ vā paṭicchādeti. ^b^bahiddhā kathaṃ apanāmetī^eb^ti bāhirato aññaṃ āgantukakathaṃ otāreti. ^b^apaneyyeso^eb^ti apaneyyo nīharitabbo esa. ^b^samaṇadūsī^eb^ti samaṇadūsako. ^b^samaṇapalāpo^eb^ti vīhīsu vīhipalāpo viya nissāratāya samaṇesu samaṇapalāpo. ^b^samaṇakāraṇḍavo^eb^ti samaṇakacavaro. ^b^bahiddhā nāsentī^eb^ti bahi nīharanti. ^b^yavakaraṇe^eb^ti yavakhette. ^b^phuṇamānassā^eb^ti ucce ṭhāne ṭhatvā mahāvāte opuniyamānassa. ^b^apasammajjantī^eb^ti ^a^P4.0075^ea^ sāradhaññānaṃ ekato dubbaladhaññānaṃ ekato karaṇatthaṃ punappunaṃ apasammajjanti, apasammajjanisaṅkhātena vātaggāhinā suppena vā vatthena vā nīharanti. ^b^daddara^eb^nti daddarasaddaṃ.

[03] ^b^saṃvāsāya^eb^nti saṃvāsena ayaṃ. ^b^vijānāthā^eb^ti jāneyyātha. ^b^santavāco^eb^ti saṇhavāco. ^b^janavatī^eb^ti janamajjhe. ^b^raho karoti karaṇa^eb^nti karaṇaṃ vuccati pāpakammaṃ, taṃ raho paṭicchanno hutvā ^a^V3.0198^ea^ karoti. ^b^saṃsappī ca musāvādī^eb^ti saṃsappitvā musāvādī, musā bhaṇanto saṃsappati phandatīti attho. imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭameva kathetvā gāthāsu vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitanti.
[06] mettāvaggo paṭhamo.

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ dutiyassa paṭhame ^b^abhivādetī^eb^ti evamādīni ^b^na samaṇo gotamo^eb^ti ettha vuttanakārena yojetvā evamettha attho veditabbo ^a^M3.0198^ea^ ``na vandati nāsanā vuṭṭhāti, nāpi `idha bhonto nisīdantū'ti evaṃ āsanena vā nimantetī''ti. ettha hi vā-saddo vibhāvane nāma atthe ^a^P4.0076^ea^ ``rūpaṃ niccaṃ vā aniccaṃ vā''tiādīsu viya. evaṃ vatvā atha attano abhivādanādīni akarontaṃ bhagavantaṃ disvā āha -- ^b^tayidaṃ, bho gotama, tathevā^eb^ti. yaṃ taṃ mayā sutaṃ, taṃ tatheva, taṃ savanañca me dassanañca saṃsandati sameti, atthato ekībhāvaṃ gacchati. na hi bhavaṃ gotamo...pe0... āsanena vā nimantetīti. evaṃ attanā sutaṃ diṭṭhena nigametvā nindanto āha -- ^b^tayidaṃ, bho gotama, na sampannamevā^eb^ti taṃ abhivādanādīnaṃ akaraṇaṃ ayuttamevāti.

[03] athassa bhagavā attukkaṃsanaparavambhanadosaṃ anupagamma karuṇāsītalena hadayena taṃ aññāṇaṃ vidhamitvā yuttabhāvaṃ dassetukāmo ^b^nāhaṃ taṃ brāhmaṇā^eb^tiādimāha. tatrāyaṃ saṅkhepattho -- ahaṃ, brāhmaṇa, appaṭihatena sabbaññutaññāṇacakkhunā olokentopi taṃ puggalaṃ etasmiṃ sadevakādibhede loke na passāmi, yamahaṃ abhivādeyyaṃ vā paccuṭṭheyyaṃ vā āsanena vā nimanteyyaṃ. anacchariyaṃ vā etaṃ, svāhaṃ ajja sabbaññutaṃ patto evarūpaṃ nipaccākārārahaṃ puggalaṃ na passāmi. apica kho yadāpāhaṃ sampatijātova uttarena mukho sattapadavītihārena gantvā ^a^V3.0199^ea^ sakalaṃ dasasahassilokadhātuṃ olokesiṃ, tadāpi etasmiṃ sadevakādibhede loke taṃ puggalaṃ na passāmi, yamahaṃ evarūpaṃ nipaccakāraṃ kareyyaṃ. atha kho maṃ soḷasakappasahassāyuko khīṇāsavamahābrahmāpi añjaliṃ paggahetvā ``tvaṃ loke mahāpuriso, tvaṃ ^a^P4.0077^ea^ sadevakassa lokassa aggo ca jeṭṭho ca seṭṭho ca, natthi tayā uttaritaro''ti sañjātasomanasso patimānesi. tadāpi cāhaṃ attanā uttaritaraṃ apassanto āsabhiṃ vācaṃ nicchāresiṃ -- ``aggohamasmi lokassa, jeṭṭhohamasmi lokassa, seṭṭhohamasmi lokassā''ti. evaṃ sampatijātassāpi mayhaṃ abhivādanādiraho puggalo natthi, svāhaṃ idāni sabbaññutaṃ patto kaṃ abhivādeyyaṃ. tasmā tvaṃ, brāhmaṇa, mā tathāgatā evarūpaṃ paramanipaccakāraṃ patthayi. yañhi, brāhmaṇa, tathāgato abhivādeyya vā...pe0... āsanena vā nimanteyya, muddhāpi tassa puggalassa rattipariyosāne paripākasithilabandhanaṃ vaṇṭā muttatālaphalaṃ viya gīvato chijjitvā sahasāva bhūmiyaṃ nipateyya.

[03] evaṃ ^a^M3.0199^ea^ vuttepi brāhmaṇo duppaññatāya tathāgatassa lokajeṭṭhabhāvaṃ asallakkhento kevalaṃ taṃ vacanaṃ asahamāno āha -- ^b^arasarūpo bhavaṃ gotamo^eb^ti. ayaṃ kirassa adhippāyo -- yaṃ loke abhivādanapaccuṭṭhānāñjalikammasāmīcikammaṃ ``sāmaggiraso''ti vuccati, taṃ bhoto gotamassa natthi. tasmā arasarūpo bhavaṃ gotamo, arasajātiko arasasabhāvoti. athassa bhagavā cittamudubhāvajananatthaṃ ujuvipaccanīkabhāvaṃ pariharanto aññathā tassa vacanassa atthaṃ ^a^P4.0078^ea^ attani sandassento ^b^atthi khvesa, brāhmaṇa, pariyāyo^eb^tiādimāha.

[03] tattha ^b^atthi khvesā^eb^ti atthi kho esa. ^b^pariyāyo^eb^ti kāraṇaṃ. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- atthi kho, brāhmaṇa, etaṃ kāraṇaṃ, yena kāraṇena maṃ ``arasarūpo bhavaṃ gotamo''ti vadamāno puggalo sammā vadeyya, avitathavādīti saṅkhaṃ gaccheyya. katamo pana soti? ye te, brāhmaṇa, rūparasā...pe0... phoṭṭhabbarasā, te tathāgatassa pahīnāti. kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti? ye te jātivasena vā upapattivasena vā seṭṭhasammatānampi puthujjanānaṃ rūpārammaṇādīni assādentānaṃ abhinandantānaṃ rajjantānaṃ uppajjanti kāmasukhassādasaṅkhātā rūparasā, saddarasā, gandharasā, rasarasā, phoṭṭhabbarasā, ye imaṃ lokaṃ gīvāya bandhitvā viya āviñchanti, vatthārammaṇādisāmaggiyañca uppannattā sāmaggirasāti vuccanti. te sabbepi tathāgatassa pahīnā. ``mayhaṃ pahīnā''ti ^a^V3.0200^ea^ vattabbepi mamākārena attānaṃ anukkhipanto dhammaṃ deseti, desanāvilāso vā esa tathāgatassa.

[03] tattha ^b^pahīnā^eb^ti cittasantānato vigatā, pajahitā vā. etasmiṃ panatthe karaṇe sāmivacanaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. ariyamaggasatthena ucchinnaṃ taṇhāvijjāmayaṃ mūlaṃ etesanti ^b^ucchinnamūlā^eb^. tālavatthu viya nesaṃ vatthu katanti ^b^tālāvatthukatā^eb^. yathā hi tālarukkhaṃ samūlaṃ uddharitvā tassa vatthumatte tasmiṃ padese kate na puna tassa tālassa uppatti paññāyati, evaṃ ariyamaggasatthena ^a^P4.0079^ea^ samūle rūpādirase uddharitvā tesaṃ pubbe uppannapubbabhāvena vatthumatte cittasantāne kate sabbepi te tālāvatthukatāti vuccanti. aviruḷhidhammattā vā matthakacchinnatālo viya katāti tālāvatthukatā. yasmā pana evaṃ tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṃkatā honti ^a^M3.0200^ea^, yathā nesaṃ pacchābhāvo na hoti, tathā katā honti. tasmā āha -- ^b^anabhāvaṃkatā^eb^ti. ^b^āyatiṃ anuppādadhammā^eb^ti anāgate anuppajjanakasabhāvā.

[03] ^b^no ca kho yaṃ tvaṃ sandhāya vadesī^eb^ti yañca kho tvaṃ sandhāya vadesi, so pariyāyo na hoti. nanu ca evaṃ vutte yo brāhmaṇena vutto sāmaggiraso, tassa attani vijjamānatā anuññātā hotīti? na hoti. yo hi naṃ sāmaggirasaṃ kātuṃ bhabbo hutvā na karoti, so tadabhāvena arasarūpoti vattabbataṃ arahati. bhagavā pana abhabbova etaṃ kātuṃ, tenassa kāraṇe abhabbataṃ pakāsento āha -- ``no ca kho yaṃ tvaṃ sandhāya vadesī''ti. yaṃ pariyāyaṃ sandhāya tvaṃ maṃ ``arasarūpo''ti vadesi, so amhesu neva vattabboti.

[03] evaṃ brāhmaṇo attanā adhippetaṃ arasarūpataṃ āropetuṃ asakkonto athāparaṃ ^b^nibbhogo bhava^eb^ntiādimāha. sabbapariyāyesu cettha vuttanayeneva yojanākkamaṃ viditvā sandhāyabhāsitamatthaṃ evaṃ veditabbaṃ -- brāhmaṇo tadeva vayovuddhānaṃ abhivādanādikammaṃ loke ^a^P4.0080^ea^ ``sāmaggiparibhogo''ti maññamāno tadabhāvena ca bhagavantaṃ ``nibbhogo''tiādimāha. bhagavā ca yvāyaṃ rūpādīsu sattānaṃ chandarāgaparibhogo, tadabhāvaṃ attani sampassamāno aparaṃ pariyāyamanujāni.

[03] puna brāhmaṇo yaṃ loke vayovuddhānaṃ abhivādanādikulasamudācārakammaṃ lokiyā karonti, tassa akiriyaṃ sampassamāno bhagavantaṃ ^b^akiriyavādo^eb^ti āha. bhagavā pana yasmā kāyaduccaritādīnaṃ ^a^V3.0201^ea^ akiriyaṃ vadati, tasmā taṃ akiriyavāditaṃ attani sampassamāno aparaṃ pariyāyamanujāni. tattha ṭhapetvā kāyaduccaritādīni avasesā akusalā dhammā ^b^anekavihitā pāpakā akusalā dhammā^eb^ti veditabbā.

[03] puna brāhmaṇo tadeva abhivādanādikammaṃ bhagavati apassanto ``imaṃ āgamma ayaṃ lokatanti lokapaveṇī ucchijjatī''ti maññamāno bhagavantaṃ ^b^ucchedavādo^eb^ti āha. bhagavā pana yasmā pañcakāmaguṇikarāgassa ceva akusalacittadvayasampayuttassa ca dosassa anāgāmimaggena ucchedaṃ vadati, sabbākusalasambhavassa pana mohassa arahattamaggena ucchedaṃ ^a^M3.0201^ea^ vadati, ṭhapetvā te tayo avasesānaṃ pāpakānaṃ akusalānaṃ dhammānaṃ yathānurūpaṃ catūhi maggehi ucchedaṃ vadati, tasmā taṃ ucchedavādaṃ attani sampassamāno aparaṃ pariyāyamanujāni.

[03] puna brāhmaṇo ``jigucchati maññe samaṇo gotamo idaṃ vayovuddhānaṃ abhivādanādikulasamudācārakammaṃ, tena taṃ na karotī''ti maññamāno bhagavantaṃ ^b^jegucchī^eb^ti āha. bhagavā pana yasmā jigucchati kāyaduccaritādīhi, yāni kāyavacīmanoduccaritāni ceva yāva ca akusalānaṃ ^a^P4.0081^ea^ lāmakadhammānaṃ samāpatti samāpajjanā samaṅgibhāvo, taṃ sabbampi gūthaṃ viya maṇḍanakajātiko puriso jigucchati hirīyati, tasmā taṃ jegucchitaṃ attani sampassamāno aparaṃ pariyāyamanujāni. tattha ^b^kāyaduccaritenā^eb^tiādi karaṇavacanaṃ upayogatthe daṭṭhabbaṃ.

[03] puna brāhmaṇo tadeva abhivādanādikammaṃ bhagavati apassanto ``ayaṃ idaṃ lokajeṭṭhakakammaṃ vineti vināseti, atha vā yasmā etaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ na karoti, tasmā ayaṃ vinetabbo niggaṇhitabbo''ti maññamāno bhagavantaṃ ^b^venayiko^eb^ti āha. tatrāyaṃ padattho -- vinayatīti vinayo, vināsetīti vuttaṃ hoti. vinayo eva ^b^venayiko^eb^. vinayaṃ vā arahatīti ^b^venayiko,^eb^ niggahaṃ arahatīti vuttaṃ hoti. bhagavā pana yasmā rāgādīnaṃ vinayāya vūpasamāya dhammaṃ deseti, tasmā venayiko hoti. ayameva cettha padattho -- vinayāya dhammaṃ desetīti venayiko. vicitrā hi taddhitavutti. svāyaṃ taṃ venayikabhāvaṃ attani sampassamāno aparaṃ pariyāyamanujāni.

[03] puna brāhmaṇo yasmā abhivādanādīni sāmīcikammāni karontā vayovuddhe tosenti hāsenti ^a^V3.0202^ea^, akarontā pana tāpenti vihesenti domanassaṃ nesaṃ uppādenti, bhagavā ca tāni na karoti, tasmā ``ayaṃ vayovuddhe tapatī''ti maññamāno sappurisācāravirahitattā vā ``kapaṇapuriso aya''nti maññamāno bhagavantaṃ ^b^tapassī^eb^ti āha. tatrāyaṃ padattho -- tapatīti tapo, roseti vihesetīti attho. sāmīcikammākaraṇassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ. tapo assa atthīti ^b^tapassī^eb^. dutiye atthavikappe byañjanāni avicāretvā loke kapaṇapuriso ^a^P4.0082^ea^ tapassīti ^a^M3.0202^ea^ vuccati. bhagavā pana ye akusalā dhammā lokaṃ tapanato tapanīyāni vuccanti, tesaṃ pahīnattā yasmā tapassīti saṅkhaṃ gato. tasmā taṃ tapassitaṃ attani sampassamāno aparaṃ pariyāyamanujāni. tatrāyaṃ vacanattho -- tapantīti tapā, akusaladhammānametaṃ adhivacanaṃ. te tape assi nirassi pahāsi viddhaṃsīti tapassī.

[03] puna brāhmaṇo taṃ abhivādanādikammaṃ devalokagabbhasampattiyā devalokapaṭisandhipaṭilābhāya saṃvattatīti maññamāno bhagavati cassa abhāvaṃ disvā bhagavantaṃ ^b^apagabbho^eb^ti āha. kodhavasena vā bhagavato mātukucchismiṃ paṭisandhiggahaṇe dosaṃ dassentopi evamāha. tatrāyaṃ vacanattho -- gabbhato apagatoti ^b^apagabbho,^eb^ abhabbo devalokūpapattiṃ pāpuṇitunti adhippāyo. hīno vā gabbho assāti apagabbho. devalokagabbhaparibāhirattā āyatiṃ hīnagabbhapaṭilābhabhāgīti. hīno vāssa mātukucchismiṃ gabbhavāso ahosīti adhippāyo. bhagavato pana yasmā āyatiṃ gabbhaseyyā apagatā, tasmā so taṃ apagabbhataṃ attani sampassamāno aparaṃ pariyāyamanujāni. tatra ca ^b^yassa kho, brāhmaṇa, āyatiṃ gabbhaseyyā punabbhavābhinibbatti pahīnā^eb^ti etesaṃ padānaṃ evamattho daṭṭhabbo -- ``brāhmaṇa, yassa puggalassa anāgate gabbhaseyyā punabbhave ca abhinibbatti anuttarena maggena vihatakāraṇattā pahīnā. gabbhaseyyāgahaṇena cettha jalābujayoni gahitā, punabbhavābhinibbattiggahaṇena itarā tisso''pi.

[03] apica gabbhassa seyyā ^b^gabbhaseyyā^eb^. punabbhavo ^a^P4.0083^ea^ eva abhinibbatti ^b^punabbhavābhinibbattī^eb^ti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. yathā ca viññāṇaṭṭhitīti vuttepi na viññāṇato aññā ṭhiti atthi, evamidhāpi na gabbhato aññā seyyā veditabbā. abhinibbatti ca nāma yasmā punabbhavabhūtāpi apunabbhavabhūtāpi atthi, idha ca punabbhavabhūtā adhippetā, tasmā vuttaṃ -- ``punabbhavo eva abhinibbatti punabbhavābhinibbattī''ti.

[03] evaṃ ^a^V3.0203^ea^ āgatakālato paṭṭhāya arasarūpatādīhi aṭṭhahi akkosavatthūhi akkosantampi brāhmaṇaṃ bhagavā dhammissaro dhammarājā dhammasāmī tathāgato anukampāya sītaleneva cakkhunā brāhmaṇaṃ olekento yaṃ dhammadhātuṃ paṭivijjhitvā desanāvilāsappattā nāma hoti, tassā ^a^M3.0203^ea^ dhammadhātuyā suppaṭividdhattā vigatavalāhake nabhe puṇṇacando viya ca saradakāle sūriyo viya ca brāhmaṇassa hadayandhakāraṃ vidhamento tāniyeva akkosavatthūni tena tena pariyāyena aññathā dassetvā punapi attano karuṇāvipphāraṃ aṭṭhahi lokadhammehi akampiyabhāvena paṭiladdhatādiguṇalakkhaṇaṃ pathavisamacittataṃ akuppadhammatañca pakāsento ``ayaṃ brāhmaṇo kevalaṃ palitasirakhaṇḍadantavalittacatādīhi attano vuddhabhāvaṃ sallakkheti, no ca kho jānāti attānaṃ jātiyā anugataṃ jarāya anusaṭaṃ byādhino adhibhūtaṃ maraṇena abbhāhataṃ ajja maritvā puna sveva uttānaseyyadārakabhāvagamanīyaṃ ^a^P4.0084^ea^. mahantena kho pana ussāhena mama santikaṃ āgato, tadassa āgamanaṃ sātthakaṃ hotū''ti cintetvā imasmiṃ loke attano appaṭisamaṃ purejātabhāvaṃ dassento ^b^seyyathāpi, brāhmaṇā^eb^tiādinā nayena brāhmaṇassa dhammadesanaṃ vaḍḍhesi.

[03] tattha ^b^seyyathāpī^eb^tiādīnaṃ heṭṭhā vutanayeneva attho veditabbo. ayaṃ pana viseso -- heṭṭhā vuttanayeneva hi te kukkuṭapotakā pakkhe vidhunantā taṃkhaṇānurūpaṃ viravantā nikkhamanti. evaṃ nikkhamantānañca tesaṃ yo paṭhamataraṃ nikkhamati, so jeṭṭhoti vuccati. tasmā bhagavā tāya upamāya attano jeṭṭhabhāvaṃ sādhetukāmo brāhmaṇaṃ pucchati -- ^b^yo nu kho tesaṃ kukkuṭacchāpotakānaṃ...pe0... kinti svāssa vacanīyo^eb^ti. tattha ^b^kukkuṭacchāpakāna^eb^nti kukkuṭapotakānaṃ. ^b^kinti svāssa vacanīyo^eb^ti so kinti vacanīyo assa, kiṃ vattabbo bhaveyya jeṭṭho vā kaniṭṭho vāti.

[03] ^b^``jeṭṭho''tissa, bho gotama, vacanīyo^eb^ti, bho gotama, so jeṭṭho iti assa vacanīyo. kasmāti ce? ^b^so hi nesaṃ jeṭṭho^eb^ti, yasmā so nesaṃ vuddhataroti attho. athassa bhagavā opammaṃ sampaṭipādento ^b^evameva kho^eb^ti āha, yathā so kukkuṭapotako, evaṃ ahampi. ^b^avijjāgatāya^eb^ ^a^P4.0085^ea^ ^b^pajāyā^eb^ti avijjā vuccati aññāṇaṃ, tattha gatāya. ^b^pajāyā^eb^ti sattadhivacanametaṃ, avijjākosassa anto paviṭṭhesu sattesūpi vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^aṇḍabhūtāyā^eb^ti aṇḍe bhūtāya pajātāya sañjātāya. yathā hi aṇḍe nibbattā ekacce sattā aṇḍabhūtāti vuccanti, evamayaṃ ^a^M3.0204^ea^ sabbāpi pajā avijjaṇḍakose nibbattattā aṇḍabhūtāti vuccati. ^b^pariyonaddhāyā^eb^ti ^a^V3.0204^ea^ tena avijjaṇḍakosena samantato onaddhāya baddhāya veṭhitāya. ^b^avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā^eb^ti taṃ avijjāmayaṃ aṇḍakosaṃ bhinditvā. ^b^ekova loke^eb^ti sakalepi lokasannivāse ahameva eko adutiyo. ^b^anuttaraṃ sammāsambodhiṃ abhisambuddho^eb^ti uttararahitaṃ sabbaseṭṭhaṃ sammā sāmañca bodhiṃ, atha vā pasatthaṃ sundarañca bodhiṃ. arahattamaggañāṇassetaṃ nāmaṃ, sabbaññutaññāṇassāpi nāmameva. ubhayampi vaṭṭati. aññesaṃ arahattamaggo anuttarā bodhi hoti, na hotīti? na hoti. kasmā? asabbaguṇadāyakattā. tesañhi kassaci arahattamaggo arahattaphalameva deti, kassaci tisso vijjā, kassaci cha abhiññā, kassaci catasso paṭisambhidā, kassaci sāvakapāramiñāṇaṃ. paccekabuddhānampi paccekabodhiñāṇameva deti, buddhānaṃ pana sabbaguṇasampattiṃ ^a^P4.0086^ea^ deti abhiseko viya rañño sabbalokissarabhāvaṃ. tasmā aññassa kassacipi anuttarā bodhi na hotīti. ^b^abhisambuddho^eb^ti abbhaññāsiṃ paṭivijjhiṃ, pattomhi adhigatomhīti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] idāni yadetaṃ bhagavatā ``evameva kho''tiādinā nayena vuttaṃ opammasampaṭipādanaṃ, taṃ evaṃ atthena saṃsanditvā veditabbaṃ -- yathā hi tassā kukkuṭiyā attano aṇḍesu adhisayanāditividhakiriyākaraṇaṃ, evaṃ bodhipallaṅke nisinnassa bodhisattabhūtassa bhagavato attano santāne aniccaṃ, dukkhaṃ, anattāti tividhānupassanākaraṇaṃ. kukkuṭiyā tividhakiriyāsampādanena aṇḍānaṃ apūtibhāvo viya bodhisattabhūtassa bhagavato tividhānupassanāsampādanena vipassanāñāṇassa aparihāni. kukkuṭiyā tividhakiriyākaraṇena aṇḍānaṃ allasinehapariyādānaṃ viya bodhisattabhūtassa bhagavato tividhānupassanāsampādanena bhavattayānugatanikantisinehapariyādānaṃ. kukkuṭiyā tividhakiriyākaraṇena aṇḍakapālānaṃ tanubhāvo viya bodhisattabhūtassa bhagavato tividhānupassanāsampādanena avijjaṇḍakosassa tanubhāvo, kukkuṭiyā tividhakiriyākaraṇena kukkuṭapotakassa pādanakhatuṇḍakānaṃ thaddhakharabhāvo viya bodhisattabhūtassa bhagavato tividhānupassanāsampādanena vipassanāñāṇassa tikkhakharavippasannasūrabhāvo. kukkuṭiyā tividhakiriyākaraṇena kukkuṭapotakassa pariṇāmakālo viya bodhisattabhūtassa ^a^M3.0205^ea^ ^a^P4.0087^ea^ bhagavato tividhānupassanāsampādanena vipassanāñāṇassa pariṇāmakālo vaḍḍhikālo gabbhaggahaṇakālo. kukkuṭiyā tividhakiriyākaraṇena kukkuṭapotakassa pādanakhasikhāya vā mukhatuṇḍakena vā aṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā pakkhe papphoṭetvā sotthinā abhinibbhidākālo viya bhagavato tividhānupassanāsampādanena vipassanāñāṇagabbhaṃ gaṇhāpetvā anupubbādhigatena ^a^V3.0205^ea^ arahattamaggena avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā abhiññāpakkhe papphoṭetvā sotthinā sakalabuddhaguṇasacchikatakālo veditabbo.

[03] ^b^ahañhi, brāhmaṇa, jeṭṭho seṭṭho lokassā^eb^ti, brāhmaṇa, yathā tesaṃ kukkuṭapotakānaṃ paṭhamataraṃ aṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā abhinibbatto kukkuṭapotako jeṭṭho hoti, evaṃ avijjāgatāya pajāya taṃ avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā paṭhamataraṃ ariyāya jātiyā jātattā ahañhi jeṭṭho vuddhatamoti saṅkhaṃ gato, sabbaguṇehi pana appaṭisamattā seṭṭhoti.

[03] evaṃ bhagavā attano anuttaraṃ jeṭṭhaseṭṭhabhāvaṃ brāhmaṇassa pakāsetvā idāni yāya paṭipadāya taṃ adhigato, taṃ paṭipadaṃ pubbabhāgato pabhuti dassetuṃ ^b^āraddhaṃ kho pana me, brāhmaṇā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^āraddhaṃ kho pana me, brāhmaṇa, vīriyaṃ ahosī^eb^ti, brāhmaṇa, na mayā ayaṃ anuttaro jeṭṭhaseṭṭhabhāvo kusītena muṭṭhassatinā sāraddhakāyena vikkhittacitena adhigato, apica kho tadadhigamāya āraddhaṃ kho pana me vīriyaṃ ahosi. bodhimaṇḍe nisinnena mayā catusammappadhānabhedaṃ vīriyaṃ āraddhaṃ ahosi, paggahitaṃ asithilappavattitaṃ. āraddhattāyeva ca me taṃ ^b^asallīnaṃ^eb^ ahosi ^a^P4.0088^ea^. na kevalañca vīriyameva, satipi me ārammaṇābhimukhabhāvena ^b^upaṭṭhitā^eb^ ahosi, upaṭṭhitattāyeva ca ^b^asammuṭṭhā. passaddho kāyo asāraddho^eb^ti kāyacittappassaddhivasena kāyopi me passaddho ahosi. tattha yasmā nāmakāye passaddhe rūpakāyopi passaddhoyeva hoti, tasmā ``nāmakāyo rūpakāyo''ti avisesetvāva ``passaddho kāyo''ti vuttaṃ. ^b^asāraddho^eb^ti so ca kho passaddhattāyeva asāraddho, vigatadarathoti vuttaṃ hoti ^a^M3.0206^ea^. ^b^samāhitaṃ cittaṃ ekagga^eb^nti cittampi me sammā āhitaṃ suṭṭhu ṭhapitaṃ appitaṃ viya ahosi, samāhitattā eva ca ekaggaṃ acalaṃ nipphandananti. ettāvatā jhānassa pubbabhāgapaṭipadā kathitā hoti.

[03] idāni imāya paṭipadāya adhigataṃ paṭhamajjhānaṃ ādiṃ katvā vijjāttayapariyosānaṃ visesaṃ dassento ^b^so kho aha^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha yaṃ yāva vinicchayanayena vattabbaṃ siyā, taṃ visuddhimagge (visuddhi0 1.69) vuttameva.

[03] ^b^ayaṃ kho me, brāhmaṇā^eb^tiādīsu pana ^b^vijjā^eb^ti viditakaraṇaṭṭhena vijjā. kiṃ viditaṃ karoti ^a^V3.0206^ea^? pubbenivāsaṃ. ^b^avijjā^eb^ti tasseva pubbenivāsassa aviditakaraṇaṭṭhena tappaṭicchādakamoho. ^b^tamo^eb^ti sveva moho tappaṭicchādakaṭṭhena tamo nāma. ^b^āloko^eb^ti ^a^P4.0089^ea^ sā eva vijjā obhāsakaraṇaṭṭhena ālokoti. ettha ca vijjā adhigatāti attho, sesaṃ pasaṃsāvacanaṃ. yojanā panettha -- ayaṃ kho me vijjā adhigatā, tassa me adhigatavijjassa avijjā vihatā, vinaṭṭhāti attho. kasmā? yasmā vijjā uppannā. esa nayo itarasmimpi padadvaye. ^b^yathā ta^eb^nti ettha ^b^ta^eb^nti nipātamattaṃ. satiyā avippavāsena appamattassa vīriyātāpena ātāpino kāye ca jīvite ca anapekkhātāya pahitattassa pesitattassāti attho. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- yathā appamattassa ātāpino pahitattassa viharato avijjā vihaññeyya, vijjā uppajjeyya tamo vihaññeyya, āloko uppajjeyya, evameva mama avijjā vihatā, vijjā uppannā, tamo vihato, āloko uppanno. etassa me padhānānuyogassa anurūpameva phalaṃ laddhanti.

[03] ^b^ayaṃ kho me, brāhmaṇa, paṭhamā abhinibbhidā ahosi kukkuṭacchāpakasseva aṇḍakosamhā^eb^ti ayaṃ kho mama, brāhmaṇa, pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇamukhatuṇḍakena pubbe nivutthakhandhappaṭicchādakaṃ avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā paṭhamā abhinibbhidā paṭhamā nikkhanti paṭhamā ariyājāti ahosi kukkuṭacchāpakasseva mukhatuṇḍakena vā ṃ pādanakhasikhāya vā aṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā tamhā aṇḍakosamhā abhinibbhidā nikkhanti kukkuṭanikāye paccājātīti. ayaṃ tāva pubbenivāsakathāyaṃ nayo.

[03] cutupapātakathāya ^a^M3.0207^ea^ pana ^b^vijjā^eb^ti dibbacakkhuñāṇavijjā. ^b^avijjā^eb^ti cutupapātappaṭicchādikā ^a^P4.0090^ea^ avijjā. yathā pana pubbenivāsakathāyaṃ ``pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇamukhatuṇḍakena pubbe nivutthakkhandhappaṭicchādakaṃ avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā''ti vuttaṃ, evamidha ``cutupapātañāṇamukhatuṇḍakena cutupapātappaṭicchādakaṃ avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā''ti vattabbaṃ.

[03] yaṃ panetaṃ paccavekkhaṇañāṇapariggahitaṃ āsavānaṃ khayañāṇādhigamaṃ brāhmaṇassa dassento ^b^ayaṃ kho me, brāhmaṇa, tatiyā vijjā^eb^tiādimāha, tattha ^b^vijjā^eb^ti arahattamaggavijjā. ^b^avijjā^eb^ti catusaccappaṭicchādikā avijjā. ^b^ayaṃ kho me, brāhmaṇa, tatiyā abhinibbhidā ahosī^eb^ti ^a^V3.0207^ea^ ettha ayaṃ kho mama, brāhmaṇa, āsavānaṃ khayañāṇamukhatuṇḍakena catusaccapaṭicchādakaṃ avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā tatiyā abhinibbhidā tatiyā nikkhanti tatiyā ariyajāti ahosi kukkuṭacchāpakasseva mukhatuṇḍakena vā pādanakhasikhāya vā aṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā tamhā aṇḍakosamhā abhinibbhidā nikkhanti kukkuṭanikāye paccājātīti.

[03] ettāvatā kiṃ dassesīti? so hi, brāhmaṇa, kukkuṭacchāpako aṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā tato nikkhamanto sakimeva jāyati, ahaṃ pana pubbenivutthakkhandhappaṭicchādakaṃ avijjaṇḍakosaṃ bhinditvā paṭhamaṃ tāva pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇavijjāya jāto. tato sattānaṃ cutipaṭisandhippaṭicchādakaṃ avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā dutiyaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇavijjāya jāto, puna catusaccappaṭicchādakaṃ avijjaṇḍakosaṃ padāletvā tatiyaṃ āsavānaṃ khayañāṇavijjāya jāto. evaṃ tīhi vijjāhi tikkhattuṃ jātomhi. sā ca me jāti ariyā suparisuddhāti idaṃ dasseti. evaṃdassento ca pubbenivāsañāṇena atītaṃsañāṇaṃ, dibbacakkhunā paccuppannānāgataṃsañāṇaṃ, āsavakkhayena sakalalokiyalokuttaraguṇanti ^a^P4.0091^ea^ evaṃ tīhi vijjāhi sabbepi sabbaññuguṇe pakāsetvā attano ariyāya jātiyā jeṭṭhaseṭṭhabhāvaṃ brāhmaṇassa dassesi.

[03] ^b^evaṃ vutte verañjo brāhmaṇo^eb^ti evaṃ bhagavatā lokānukampakena brāhmaṇaṃ anukampamānena niguhitabbepi attano ariyāya jātiyā jeṭṭhaseṭṭhabhāve vijjāttayapakāsikāya dhammadesanāya vutte pītivipphāraparipuṇṇagattacitto verañjo brāhmaṇo taṃ bhagavato ariyāya jātiyā jeṭṭhaseṭṭhabhāvaṃ viditvā ``īdisaṃ nāmāhaṃ sabbalokajeṭṭhaṃ ^a^M3.0208^ea^ sabbaguṇasamannāgataṃ sabbaññuṃ `aññesaṃ abhivādanādikammaṃ na karotī'ti avacaṃ, dhiratthu vata, bho, aññāṇa''nti attānaṃ garahitvā ``ayaṃ dāni loke ariyāya jātiyā purejātaṭṭhena jeṭṭho, sabbaguṇehi appaṭisamaṭṭhena seṭṭho''ti niṭṭhaṃ gantvā bhagavantaṃ etadavoca -- ^b^jeṭṭho bhavaṃ gotamo seṭṭho bhavaṃ gotamo^eb^ti. evañca pana vatvā puna taṃ bhagavato dhammadesanaṃ abbhanumodamāno ^b^abhikkantaṃ bho gotamā^eb^tiādimāha. taṃ vuttatthamevāti.

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^abhiññātā^eb^ti ñātā paññātā pākaṭā. ^b^santhāgāre^eb^ti mahājanassa vissamanatthāya ^a^V3.0208^ea^ kate agāre. sā kira santhāgārasālā nagaramajjhe ahosi, catūsu ṭhānesu ṭhitānaṃ paññāyati, catūhi disāhi āgatamanussā paṭhamaṃ tattha vissamitvā pacchā attano attano phāsukaṭṭhānaṃ gacchanti. rājakulānaṃ rajjakiccasantharaṇatthāya ^a^P4.0092^ea^ kataṃ agārantipi vadantiyeva. tattha hi nisīditvā licchavirājāno rajjakiccaṃ santharanti karonti vicārenti. ^b^sannisinnā^eb^ti tesaṃ nisīdanatthaññeva paññattesu mahārahavarapaccattharaṇesu samussitasetacchattesu āsanesu sannisinnā. ^b^anekapariyāyena buddhassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantī^eb^ti rājakule kiccañceva lokatthacariyañca vicāretvā anekehi kāraṇehi buddhassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti kathenti dīpenti. paṇḍitā hi te rājāno saddhā pasannā sotāpannāpi sakadāgāminopi anāgāminopi ariyasāvakā, te sabbepi lokiyajaṭaṃ chinditvā buddhādīnaṃ tiṇṇaṃ ratanānaṃ vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti. tattha tividho buddhavaṇṇo nāma cariyavaṇṇo, sarīravaṇṇo, guṇavaṇṇoti. tatrime rājāno cariyāya vaṇṇaṃ ārabhiṃsu -- ``dukkaraṃ vata kataṃ sammāsambuddhena kappasatasahassādhikāni cattāri asaṅkheyyāni dasa pāramiyo, dasa upapāramiyo, dasa paramatthapāramiyoti samattiṃsa pāramiyo pūrentena, ñātatthacariyaṃ, lokatthacariyaṃ, buddhacariyaṃ matthakaṃ pāpetvā pañca mahāpariccāge pariccajantenā''ti aḍḍhacchakkehi jātakasatehi buddhavaṇṇaṃ kathentā tusitabhavanaṃ pāpetvā ṭhapayiṃsu.

[03] ^b^dhammassa^eb^ ^a^M3.0209^ea^ ^b^vaṇṇaṃ^eb^ bhāsantā pana ``tena bhagavatā dhammo desito, nikāyato pañca nikāyā, piṭakato tīṇi piṭakāni, aṅgato nava aṅgāni, khandhato caturāsītidhammakkhandhasahassānī''ti koṭṭhāsavasena dhammaguṇaṃ kathayiṃsu.

[03] ^b^saṅghassa vaṇṇaṃ^eb^ bhāsantā satthu dhammadesanaṃ sutvā ``paṭiladdhasaddhā kulaputtā bhogakkhandhañceva ñātiparivaṭṭañca ^a^P4.0093^ea^ pahāya setacchattaṃ oparajjaṃ senāpatiseṭṭhibhaṇḍāgārikaṭṭhānantarādīni agaṇetvā nikkhamma satthu varasāsane pabbajanti. setacchattaṃ pahāya pabbajitānaṃ bhaddiyarājamahākappinapukkusātiādīnaṃ rājapabbajitānaṃyeva buddhakāle asītisahassāni ahesuṃ. anekakoṭisataṃ dhanaṃ pahāya pabbajitānaṃ pana yasakulaputtasoṇaseṭṭhiputtaraṭṭhapālakulaputtādīnaṃ paricchedo natthi. evarūpā ca evarūpā ca kulaputtā satthu sāsane pabbajantī''ti pabbajjāsaṅkhepavasena saṅghaguṇe kathayiṃsu.

[03] ^b^sīho^eb^ ^a^V3.0209^ea^ ^b^senāpatī^eb^ti evaṃnāmako senāya adhipati. vesāliyañhi satta sahassāni satta satāni satta ca rājāno. te sabbepi sannipatitvā sabbesaṃ manaṃ gahetvā ``raṭṭhaṃ vicāretuṃ samatthaṃ ekaṃ vicinathā''ti vicinantā sīhaṃ rājakumāraṃ disvā ``ayaṃ sakkhissatī''ti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katvā tassa rattamaṇivaṇṇaṃ kambalapariyonaddhaṃ senāpaticchattaṃ adaṃsu. taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ -- ``sīho senāpatī''ti. ^b^nigaṇṭhasāvako^eb^ti nigaṇṭhassa nāṭaputtassa paccayadāyako upaṭṭhāko. jambudīpatalasmiñhi tayo janā nigaṇṭhānaṃ aggupaṭṭhākā -- nāḷandāyaṃ, upāli gahapati, kapilapure vappo sakko, vesāliyaṃ ayaṃ sīho senāpatīti. ^b^nisinno^eb^ ^a^P4.0094^ea^ ^b^hotī^eb^ti sesarājūnaṃ parisāya antarantare āsanāni paññāpayiṃsu, sīhassa pana majjhe ṭhāneti tasmiṃ paññatte mahārahe rājāsane nisinno hoti. ^b^nissaṃsaya^eb^nti nibbicikicchaṃ addhā ekaṃsena, na hete yassa vā tassa vā appesakkhassa evaṃ anekasatehi kāraṇehi vaṇṇaṃ bhāsanti.

[03] ^b^yena nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto tenupasaṅkamī^eb^ti nigaṇṭho kira nāṭaputto ``sacāyaṃ sīho kassacideva samaṇassa gotamassa vaṇṇaṃ kathentassa sutvā samaṇaṃ gotamaṃ dassanāya upasaṅkamissati, mayhaṃ parihāni bhavissatī''ti ^a^M3.0210^ea^ cintetvā paṭhamataraṃyeva sīhaṃ senāpatiṃ etadavoca -- ``senāpati imasmiṃ loke `ahaṃ buddho ahaṃ buddho'ti bahū vicaranti. sace tvaṃ kassaci dassanāya upasaṅkamitukāmo ahosi, maṃ puccheyyāsi. ahaṃ te yuttaṭṭhānaṃ pesessāmi, ayuttaṭṭhānato nivāressāmī''ti. so taṃ kathaṃ anussaritvā ``sace maṃ pesessati, gamissāmi. no ce, na gamissāmī''ti cintetvā yena nigaṇṭho nāṭaputto, tenupasaṅkami.

[03] athassa vacanaṃ sutvā nigaṇṭho mahāpabbatena viya balavasokena otthaṭo ``yattha dānissāhaṃ gamanaṃ na icchāmi, tattheva gantukāmo jāto, hatohamasmī''ti anattamano hutvā ``paṭibāhanupāyamassa karissāmī''ti cintetvā ^b^kiṃ pana tva^eb^ntiādimāha. evaṃ vadanto vicarantaṃ goṇaṃ daṇḍena paharanto viya jalamānaṃ padīpaṃ nibbāpento viya bhattabharitaṃ pattaṃ nikkujjanto viya ca sīhassa uppannapītiṃ vināsesi. ^b^gamiyābhisaṅkhāro^eb^ti hatthiyānādīnaṃ yojāpanagandhamālādiggahaṇavasena pavatto payogo. ^b^so paṭippassambhī^eb^ti ^a^P4.0095^ea^ so vūpasanto.

[03] ^b^dutiyampi kho^eb^ti dutiyavārampi. imasmiñca vāre buddhassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantā tusitabhavanato paṭṭhāya yāva mahābodhipallaṅkā dasabalassa heṭṭhā pādatalehi upari kesaggehi paricchinditvā ^a^V3.0210^ea^ dvattiṃsamahāpurisalakkhaṇāsītianubyañjanabyāmappabhānaṃ vasena sarīravaṇṇaṃ kathayiṃsu. dhammassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantā ``ekapadepi ekabyañjanepi avakhalitaṃ nāma natthī''ti sukathitavaseneva dhammaguṇaṃ kathayiṃsu. saṅghassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantā ``evarūpaṃ yasasirivibhavaṃ pahāya satthu sāsane pabbajitā na kosajjapakatikā honti, terasasu pana dhutaṅgaguṇesu paripūrakārino hutvā sattasu anupassanāsu kammaṃ karonti, aṭṭhatiṃsārammaṇavibhattiyo vaḷañjentī''ti paṭipadāvasena saṅghaguṇe kathayiṃsu.

[03] tatiyavāre pana buddhassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsamānā ``itipi so bhagavā''ti suttantapariyāyeneva buddhaguṇe kathayiṃsu, ``svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo''tiādinā suttantapariyāyeneva dhammaguṇe, ``suppaṭipanno bhagavato ^a^M3.0211^ea^ sāvakasaṅgho''tiādinā suttantapariyāyeneva saṅghaguṇe ca kathayiṃsu. tato sīho cintesi -- ``imesañca licchavirājakumārānaṃ tatiyadivasato paṭṭhāya buddhadhammasaṅghaguṇe kathentānaṃ mukhaṃ nappahoti, addhā anomaguṇena samannāgatā ^a^P4.0096^ea^ so bhagavā, imaṃ dāni uppannaṃ pītiṃ avijahitvāva ahaṃ ajja sammāsambuddhaṃ passissāmī''ti. athassa ``kiṃ hi me karissanti nigaṇṭhā''ti vitakko udapādi. tattha ^b^kiṃ hi me karissantī^eb^ti kiṃ nāma mayhaṃ nigaṇṭhā karissanti. ^b^apalokitā vā anapalokitā vā^eb^ti āpucchitā vā anāpucchitā vā. na hi me te āpucchitā yānavāhanasampattiṃ, na ca issariyavisesaṃ dassanti, nāpi anāpucchitā harissanti, aphalaṃ etesaṃ āpucchananti adhippāyo.

[03] ^b^vesāliyā niyyāsī^eb^ti yathā hi gimhakāle deve vuṭṭhe udakaṃ sandamānaṃ nadiṃ otaritvā thokameva gantvā tiṭṭhati nappavattati, evaṃ sīhassa paṭhamadivase ``dasabalaṃ passissāmī''ti uppannāya pītiyā nigaṇṭhena paṭibāhitakālo. yathāpi dutiyadivase deve vuṭṭhe udakaṃ sandamānaṃ nadiṃ otaritvā thokaṃ gantvā vālikāpuñjaṃ paharitvā appavattaṃ hoti, evaṃ sīhassa dutiyadivase ``dasabalaṃ passissāmī''ti uppannāya pītiyā nigaṇṭhena paṭibāhitakālo. yathā tatiyadivase deve vuṭṭhe udakaṃ sandamānaṃ nadiṃ otaritvā purāṇapaṇṇasukkhadaṇḍakaṭṭhakacavarādīni parikaḍḍhantaṃ vālikāpuñjaṃ bhinditvā samuddaninnameva hoti, evaṃ sīho tatiyadivase tiṇṇaṃ vatthūnaṃ guṇakathaṃ sutvā uppanne pītipāmojje ``aphalā nigaṇṭhā nipphalā nigaṇṭhā, kiṃ me ime karissanti, gamissāmahaṃ satthusantika''nti manaṃ abhinīharitvā vesāliyā niyyāsi. niyyanto ca ``cirassāhaṃ dasabalassa santikaṃ gantukāmo ^a^V3.0211^ea^ jāto, na kho pana me yuttaṃ aññātakavesena ^a^P4.0097^ea^ gantu''nti ``yekeci dasabalassa santikaṃ gantukāmā, sabbe nikkhamantū''ti ghosanaṃ kāretvā pañcarathasatāni yojāpetvā uttamarathe ṭhito tehi ceva pañcahi rathasatehi mahatiyā ca parisāya parivuto gandhapupphacuṇṇavāsādīni gāhāpetvā niyyāsi. ^b^divā divassā^eb^ti divasassa ca divā, majjhanhike atikkantamatte.

[03] ^b^yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamī^eb^ti ārāmaṃ pavisanto dūratova asīti-anubyañjana-byāmappabhā-dvattiṃsa-mahāpurisalakkhaṇāni chabbaṇṇaghanabuddharasmiyo ca disvā ``evarūpaṃ nāma purisaṃ evaṃ āsanne vasantaṃ ettakaṃ kālaṃ nāddasaṃ, vañcito ^a^M3.0212^ea^ vatamhi, alābhā vata me''ti cintetvā mahānidhiṃ disvā daliddapuriso viya sañjātapītipāmojjo yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami. ^b^dhammassa cānudhammaṃ byākarontī^eb^ti bhotā gotamena vuttakāraṇassa anukāraṇaṃ kathenti. kāraṇavacano hettha dhammasaddo ``hetumhi ñāṇaṃ dhammapaṭisambhidā''tiādīsu (vibha0 720) viya. kāraṇanti cettha tathāpavattassa saddassa attho adhippeto tassa pavattihetubhāvato. atthappayutto hi saddappayogo. anukāraṇanti eso eva parehi tathā vuccamāno. ^b^sahadhammiko vādānuvādoti^eb^. parehi vuttakāraṇehi sakāraṇo hutvā tumhākaṃ vādo vā tato paraṃ tassa anuvādo vā koci appamattakopi viññūhi garahitabbaṃ ṭhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ na āgacchati. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- kiṃ sabbākārenapi tava vāde gārayhaṃ kāraṇaṃ natthīti. ^b^anabbhakkhātukāmā^eb^ti na abhūtena vattukāmā. ^b^atthi sīhapariyāyo^eb^tiādīnaṃ attho verañjakaṇḍe āgatanayeneva veditabbo. ^b^paramena^eb^ ^a^P4.0098^ea^ ^b^assāsenā^eb^ti catumaggacatuphalasaṅkhātena uttamena. ^b^assāsāya dhammaṃ desemī^eb^ti assāsanatthāya santhambhanatthāya dhammaṃ desemi. iti bhagavā aṭṭhahaṅgehi sīhassa senāpatissa dhammaṃ desesi.

[03] ^b^anuviccakāra^eb^nti anuviditvā cintetvā tulayitvā kattabbaṃ karohīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^sādhu hotī^eb^ti sundaro hoti. tumhādisasmiñhi maṃ disvā maṃ saraṇaṃ gacchante nigaṇṭhaṃ disvā nigaṇṭhaṃ saraṇaṃ gacchante ``kiṃ ayaṃ sīho diṭṭhadiṭṭhameva saraṇaṃ gacchatī''ti garahā uppajjati, tasmā anuviccakāro tumhādisānaṃ sādhūti dasseti. ^b^paṭākaṃ parihareyyu^eb^nti te kira evarūpaṃ sāvakaṃ labhitvā ``asuko nāma rājā vā rājamahāmatto vā seṭṭhi vā amhākaṃ saraṇaṃ gato sāvako jāto''ti paṭākaṃ ukkhipitvā nagare ghosentā āhiṇḍanti. kasmā? evaṃ no mahantabhāvo ^a^V3.0212^ea^ āvibhavissatīti ca. sace panassa ``kimahaṃ etesaṃ saraṇaṃ gato''ti vippaṭisāro uppajjeyya, tampi so ``etesaṃ me saraṇagatabhāvaṃ bahū jānanti, dukkhaṃ idāni paṭinivattitu''nti vinodetvā na paṭikkamissatīti ca. tenāha -- ``paṭākaṃ parihareyyu''nti. ^b^opānabhūta^eb^nti paṭiyattaudapāno viya ṭhitaṃ. ^b^kula^eb^nti tava nivesanaṃ. ^b^dātabbaṃ maññeyyāsī^eb^ti pubbe dasapi vīsatipi saṭṭhipi jane āgate disvā ^a^M3.0213^ea^ natthīti avatvā desi, idāni maṃ ^a^P4.0099^ea^ saraṇaṃ gatakāraṇamatteneva mā imesaṃ deyyadhammaṃ upacchindi. sampattānañhi dātabbamevāti ovadi. ^b^sutaṃ metaṃ, bhante^eb^ti kuto sutanti? nigaṇṭhānaṃ santikā. te kira kulagharesu evaṃ pakāsenti ``mayaṃ yassa kassaci sampattassa dātabbanti vadāma, samaṇo pana gotamo `mayhameva dānaṃ dātabbaṃ nāññesaṃ, mayhameva sāvakānaṃ dānaṃ dātabbaṃ, nāññesaṃ sāvakānaṃ, mayhameva dinnaṃ dānaṃ mahapphalaṃ, nāññesaṃ, mayhameva sāvakānaṃ dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ, nāññesa'nti evaṃ vadatī''ti. taṃ sandhāya ayaṃ ``sutaṃ meta''nti āha.

[03] ^b^anupubbiṃ katha^eb^nti dānānantaraṃ sīlaṃ, sīlānantaraṃ saggaṃ, saggānantaraṃ magganti evaṃ anupaṭipāṭikathaṃ. tattha ^b^dānakatha^eb^nti idaṃ dānaṃ nāma sukhānaṃ nidānaṃ, sampattīnaṃ mūlaṃ, bhogānaṃ patiṭṭhā, visamagatassa tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ gati parāyaṇaṃ, idhalokaparalokesu dānasadiso avassayo patiṭṭhā ārammaṇaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ gati parāyaṇaṃ natthi. idañhi avassayaṭṭhena ratanamayasīhāsanasadisaṃ, patiṭṭhānaṭṭhena mahāpathavīsadisaṃ, ārammaṇaṭṭhena ālambanarajjusadisaṃ. idañhi dukkhanittharaṇaṭṭhena nāvā, samassāsanaṭṭhena saṅgāmasūro, bhayaparittāṇaṭṭhena ^a^P4.0100^ea^ susaṅkhatanagaraṃ, maccheramalādīhi anupalittaṭṭhena padumaṃ, tesaṃ nidahanaṭṭhena aggi, durāsadaṭṭhena āsiviso, asantāsanaṭṭhena sīho, balavantaṭṭhena hatthī, abhimaṅgalasammataṭṭhena setavasabho, khemantabhūmisampāpanaṭṭhena valāhako assarājā. dānaṃ nāmetaṃ mayā gatamaggo, mayheso vaṃso, mayā dasa pāramiyo pūrentena velāmamahāyañño, mahāgovindamahāyañño, mahāsudassanamahāyañño, vessantaramahāyaññoti, anekamahāyaññā pavattitā, sasabhūtena jalitāggikkhandhe attānaṃ niyyādentena sampattayācakānaṃ cittaṃ gahitaṃ. dānañhi loke sakkasampattiṃ deti mārasampattiṃ brahmasampattiṃ, cakkavattisampattiṃ, sāvakapāramīñāṇaṃ, paccekabodhiñāṇaṃ, abhisambodhiñāṇaṃ detīti evamādidānaguṇappaṭisaṃyuttaṃ kathaṃ.

[03] yasmā pana dānaṃ dento sīlaṃ samādātuṃ sakkoti, tasmā tadanantaraṃ sīlakathaṃ kathesi. ^b^sīlakatha^eb^nti ^a^V3.0213^ea^ sīlaṃ nāmetaṃ avassayo patiṭṭhā ārammaṇaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ gati parāyaṇaṃ. sīlaṃ nāmetaṃ mama vaṃso ^a^M3.0214^ea^, ahaṃ saṅkhapālanāgarājakāle bhūridattanāgarājakāle campeyyanāgarājakāle sīlavarājakāle mātuposakahatthirājakāle chaddantahatthirājakāleti anantesu attabhāvesu sīlaṃ paripūresiṃ. idhalokaparalokasampattīnañhi sīlasadiso avassayo patiṭṭhā ārammaṇaṃ tāṇaṃ leṇaṃ gati parāyaṇaṃ natthi, sīlālaṅkārasadiso alaṅkāro natthi, sīlapupphasadisaṃ pupphaṃ natthi, sīlagandhasadiso gandho natthi. sīlālaṅkārena hi alaṅkataṃ sīlagandhānulittaṃ sadevakopi loko ^a^P4.0101^ea^ olokento tittiṃ na gacchatīti evamādisīlaguṇappaṭisaṃyuttaṃ kathaṃ.

[03] ``idaṃ pana sīlaṃ nissāya ayaṃ saggo labbhatī''ti dassetuṃ sīlānantaraṃ saggakathaṃ kathesi. ^b^saggakatha^eb^nti ``ayaṃ saggo nāma iṭṭho kanto manāpo, niccamettha kīḷā, niccaṃ sampattiyo labbhanti, cātumahārājikā devā navutivassasatasahassāni dibbasukhaṃ dibbasampattiṃ anubhavanti, tāvatiṃsā tisso ca vassakoṭiyo saṭṭhi ca vassasatasahassānī''ti evamādisaggaguṇappaṭisaṃyuttaṃ kathaṃ. saggasampattiṃ kathayantānañhi buddhānaṃ mukhaṃ nappahoti. vuttampi cetaṃ -- ``anekapariyāyena khvāhaṃ, bhikkhave, saggakathaṃ katheyya''ntiādi (ma0 ni0 3.255).

[03] evaṃ saggakathāya palobhetvā pana hatthiṃ alaṅkaritvā tassa soṇḍaṃ chindanto viya ``ayampi saggo anicco addhuvo, na ettha chandarāgo kattabbo''ti dassanatthaṃ ``appassādā kāmā bahudukkhā bahupāyāsā, ādīnavo ettha bhiyyo''tiādinā (ma0 ni0 1.235-236; 2.42) nayena ^b^kāmānaṃ ādīnavaṃ okāraṃ saṃkilesaṃ^eb^ kathesi. tattha ^b^ādīnavo^eb^ti doso. ^b^okāro^eb^ti avakāro lāmakabhāvo. ^b^saṃkileso^eb^ti tehi sattānaṃ saṃsāre saṃkilissanaṃ. yathāha -- ``saṃkilissanti vata, bho, sattā''ti (ma0 ni0 2.351).

[03] evaṃ kāmādīnavena tajjetvā ^b^nekkhamme ānisaṃsaṃ pakāsesi. kallacitta^eb^nti arogacittaṃ. ^b^sāmukkaṃsikā^eb^ti sāmaṃ ukkaṃsikā attanāyeva uddharitvā gahitā, sayambhuñāṇena ^a^P4.0102^ea^ diṭṭhā asādhāraṇā aññesanti attho. kā pana sāti? ariyasaccadesanā. tenevāha -- ^b^dukkhaṃ samudayaṃ nirodhaṃ magga^eb^nti. ^b^virajaṃ vītamala^eb^nti rāgarajādīnaṃ abhāvā virajaṃ, rāgamalādīnaṃ ^a^M3.0215^ea^ vigatattā vītamalaṃ. ^b^dhammacakkhu^eb^nti idha sotāpattimaggo adhippeto. tassa uppattiākāradassanatthaṃ ^a^V3.0214^ea^ ^b^yaṃkiñci samudayadhammaṃ sabbaṃ taṃ nirodhadhamma^eb^nti āha. tañhi nirodhaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā kiccavasena evaṃ sabbasaṅkhataṃ paṭivijjhantaṃ uppajjati. diṭṭho ariyasaccadhammo etenāti ^b^diṭṭhadhammo^eb^. esa nayo sesesupi. tiṇṇā vicikicchā anenāti ^b^tiṇṇavicikiccho^eb^. vigatā kathaṃkathā assāti ^b^vigatakathaṃkatho^eb^. visārajjaṃ pattoti ^b^vesārajjappatto^eb^. kattha? satthusāsane. nāssa paro paccayo, na paraṃ saddhāya ettha vattatīti ^b^aparappaccayo^eb^.

[03] ^b^pavattamaṃsa^eb^nti pakatiyā pavattaṃ kappiyamaṃsaṃ mūlaṃ gahetvā antarāpaṇe pariyesāhīti adhippāyo. ^b^sambahulā nigaṇṭhā^eb^ti pañcasatamattā nigaṇṭhā. ^b^thūlaṃ pasu^eb^nti thūlaṃ mahāsarīraṃ gokaṇṇamahiṃsasūkarasaṅkhātaṃ pasuṃ. ^b^uddissakata^eb^nti attānaṃ uddisitvā kataṃ, māritanti attho. ^b^paṭiccakamma^eb^nti svāyaṃ taṃ maṃsaṃ paṭicca taṃ pāṇavadhakammaṃ phusati. tañhi akusalaṃ upaḍḍhaṃ dāyakassa, upaḍḍhaṃ paṭiggāhakassa hotīti nesaṃ laddhi. aparo ^a^P4.0103^ea^ nayo -- ^b^paṭiccakamma^eb^nti attānaṃ paṭiccakataṃ. atha vā ^b^paṭiccakamma^eb^nti nimittakammassetaṃ adhivacanaṃ, taṃ paṭiccakammaṃ ettha atthīti maṃsampi paṭiccakammanti vuttaṃ. ^b^upakaṇṇake^eb^ti kaṇṇamūle. ^b^ala^eb^nti paṭikkhepavacanaṃ, kiṃ imināti attho. ^b^na ca panete^eb^ti ete āyasmanto dīgharattaṃ avaṇṇakāmā hutvā avaṇṇaṃ bhāsantāpi abbhācikkhantā na jiridanti, abbhakkhānassa antaṃ na gacchantīti attho. atha vā lajjanatthe idaṃ ^b^jiridantī^eb^ti padaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ, na lajjantīti attho.

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^aṅgehī^eb^ti guṇaṅgehi. ^b^tassaṃ disāyaṃ jāto hotī^eb^ti tassaṃ sindhunadītīradisāyaṃ jāto hoti. aññepi bhadrā assājānīyā tattheva jāyanti. ^b^allaṃ vā sukkhaṃ vā^eb^ti allatiṇaṃ vā sukkhatiṇaṃ vā. ^b^nāññe asse ubbejetā^eb^ti aññe asse na ubbejeti na paharati na ḍaṃsati na kalahaṃ karoti. ^b^sāṭheyyānī^eb^ti saṭhabhāvo. ^b^kūṭeyyānī^eb^ti kūṭabhāvo. ^b^jimheyyānī^eb^ti jimhabhāvo. ^b^vaṅkeyyānī^eb^ti vaṅkabhāvā. iccassa catūhipi padehi asikkhitabhāvova kathito ^a^M3.0216^ea^. ^b^vāhī^eb^ti vahanasabhāvo dinnovādapaṭikaro. ^b^yāva^eb^ ^a^P4.0104^ea^ ^b^jīvitamaraṇapariyādānā^eb^ti yāva jīvitassa maraṇena pariyosānā. ^b^sakkaccaṃ paribhuñjatī^eb^ti amataṃ ^a^V3.0215^ea^ viya paccavekkhitvā paribhuñjati. ^b^purisathāmenā^eb^tiādīsu ñāṇathāmādayo kathitā. ^b^saṇṭhāna^eb^nti osakkanaṃ paṭippassaddhi.

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^``pehī''ti vutto^eb^ti ``gacchā''ti vutto. ^b^piṭṭhito rathaṃ pavattetī^eb^ti khandhaṭṭhikena yugaṃ uppīḷitvā pacchimabhāgena rathaṃ pavaṭṭento osakkati. ^b^pacchā laṅghati, kubbaraṃ hanatī^eb^ti dve pacchimapāde ukkhipitvā tehi paharitvā rathakubbaraṃ bhindati. ^b^tidaṇḍaṃ bhañjatī^eb^ti rathassa purato tayo daṇḍakā honti, te bhañjati. ^b^rathīsāya satthiṃ ussajjitvā^eb^ti sīsaṃ nāmetvā yugaṃ bhūmiyaṃ pātetvā satthinā rathīsaṃ paharitvā. ^b^ajjhomaddatī^eb^ti dvīhi purimapādehi īsaṃ maddanto tiṭṭhati. ^b^ubbaṭumaṃ rathaṃ karotī^eb^ti thalaṃ vā kaṇḍakaṭṭhānaṃ vā rathaṃ āropeti. ^b^anādiyitvā^eb^ti amanasikatvā agaṇitvā. ^b^mukhādhāna^eb^nti mukhaṭhapanatthāya dinnaṃ ayasaṅkhalikaṃ. ^b^khīlaṭṭhāyī^eb^ti cattāro pāde thambhe viya niccalaṃ ṭhapetvā khīlaṭṭhānasadisena ṭhānena tiṭṭhati. imasmiṃ ^a^P4.0105^ea^ sutte vaṭṭameva kathitaṃ.

[03] 15^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^asajjhāyamalā^eb^ti uggahitamantānaṃ asajjhāyakaraṇaṃ malaṃ nāma hoti. ^b^anuṭṭhānamalā gharā^eb^ti uṭṭhānavīriyābhāvo gharānaṃ malaṃ nāma. ^b^vaṇṇassā^eb^ti sarīravaṇṇassa. ^b^rakkhato^eb^ti yaṃkiñci attano santakaṃ rakkhantassa. ^b^avijjā paramaṃ mala^eb^nti tato sesākusaladhammamalato aṭṭhasu ṭhānesu aññāṇabhūtā vaṭṭamūlasaṅkhātā bahalandhakārāvijjā paramaṃ malaṃ. tato hi malataraṃ nāma natthi. imasmimpi sutte vaṭṭameva kathitaṃ.

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^dūteyya^eb^nti dūtakammaṃ. ^b^gantumarahatī^eb^ti taṃ dūteyyasaṅkhātaṃ sāsanaṃ dhāretvā harituṃ arahati. ^b^sotā^eb^ti yo taṃ assa sāsanaṃ deti ^a^M3.0217^ea^, tassa sotā. ^b^sāvetā^eb^ti taṃ uggaṇhitvā ``idaṃ nāma tumhehi vutta''nti paṭisāvetā. ^b^uggahetā^eb^ti suggahitaṃ katvā uggahetā. ^b^dhāretā^eb^ti sudhāritaṃ ^a^V3.0216^ea^ katvā dhāretā. ^b^viññā^eb^ti atthānatthassa atthaṃ jānitā. ^b^viññāpetā^eb^ti paraṃ vijānāpetā. ^b^sahitā sahitassā^eb^ti idaṃ sahitaṃ, idaṃ asahitanti evaṃ sahitāsahitassa kusalo, upagatānupagatesu cheko sāsanaṃ ārocento sahitaṃ sallakkhetvā āroceti. ^b^na byathatī^eb^ti vedhati na chambhati. ^b^asandiddha^eb^nti ^a^P4.0106^ea^ nissandehaṃ vigatasaṃsayaṃ. ^b^pucchito^eb^ti pañhatthāya pucchito.
[03] 17-18^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^ruṇṇenā^eb^ti ruditena. ^b^ākappenā^eb^ti nivāsanapārupanādinā vidhānena. ^b^vanabhaṅgenā^eb^ti vanato bhañjitvā āhaṭena pupphaphalādipaṇṇākārena. aṭṭhamepi eseva nayo.

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^pahārādo^eb^ti evaṃnāmako. ^b^asurindo^eb^ti asurajeṭṭhako. asuresu hi vepacitti rāhu pahārādoti ime tayo jeṭṭhakā. ^b^yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamī^eb^ti dasabalassa abhisambuddhadivasato paṭṭhāya ``ajja gamissāmi sve gamissāmī''ti ekādasa vassāni atikkamitvā dvādasame vasse satthu verañjāyaṃ vasanakāle ``sammāsambuddhassa santikaṃ gamissāmī''ti cittaṃ uppādetvā ``mama `ajja sve'ti dvādasa vassāni jātāni, handāhaṃ idāneva gacchāmī''ti taṅkhaṇaṃyeva asuragaṇaparivuto asurabhavanā nikkhamitvā divā divassa yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami, ^b^ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsī^eb^ti so kira ``tathāgataṃ pañhaṃ pucchitvā eva dhammaṃ suṇissāmī''ti āgato, tathāgatassa pana diṭṭhakālato paṭṭhāya buddhagāravena pucchituṃ asakkonto api satthāraṃ vanditvā ekamantaṃ aṭṭhāsi. tato satthā cintesi -- ``ayaṃ pahārādo mayi akathente paṭhamataraṃ kathetuṃ na sakkhissati, ciṇṇavasiṭṭhāneyeva naṃ kathāsamuṭṭhāpanatthaṃ ekaṃ pañhaṃ pucchissāmī''ti ^a^P4.0107^ea^.

[03] atha ^a^M3.0218^ea^ naṃ pucchanto ^b^api pana pahārādā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^abhiramantī^eb^ti ratiṃ vindanti, anukkaṇṭhamānā vasantīti attho. so ``pariciṇṇaṭṭhāneyeva maṃ bhagavā pucchatī''ti attamano hutvā ^b^abhiramanti, bhante^eb^ti āha. ^b^anupubbaninno^eb^tiādīni sabbāni anupaṭipāṭiyā ninnabhāvassa vevacanāni. ^b^na āyatakeneva papāto^eb^ti na chinnataṭamahāsobbho viya āditova papāto ^a^V3.0217^ea^. so hi tīrato paṭṭhāya ekaṅguladvaṅgulavidatthiratanayaṭṭhiusabhāḍḍhagāvutagāvutāḍḍhayojanādivasena gambhīro hutvā gacchanto sinerupādamūle caturāsītiyojanasahassagambhīro hutvā ṭhitoti dasseti.
[03] ^b^ṭhitadhammo^eb^ti ṭhitasabhāvo. ^b^kuṇapenā^eb^ti yena kenaci hatthiassādīnaṃ kaḷevarena. ^b^thalaṃ ussāretī^eb^ti hatthena gahetvā viya vīcipahāreneva thalaṃ khipati.

[03] ^b^gaṅgāyamunā^eb^ti idha ṭhatvā imāsaṃ nadīnaṃ uppattikathaṃ kathetuṃ vaṭṭati. ayaṃ tāva jambudīpo dasasahassayojanaparimāṇo, tattha catusahassayojanaparimāṇo padeso udakena ajjhotthaṭo mahāsamuddoti saṅkhaṃ gato, tisahassayojanappamāṇe manussā vasanti, tisahassayojanappamāṇe himavā patiṭṭhito ubbedhena pañcayojanasatiko caturāsītikūṭasahassapaṭimaṇḍito samantato sandamānapañcasatanadīvicitto, yattha āyāmavitthārena ca gambhīrato ca paṇṇāsapaṇṇāsayojanā diyaḍḍhayojanasataparimaṇḍalā anotattadaho kaṇṇamuṇḍadaho ^a^P4.0108^ea^ rathakāradaho chaddantadaho kuṇāladaho mandākinidaho sīhappapātadahoti satta mahāsarā patiṭṭhahanti.

[03] tesu ^b^anotatto^eb^ sudassanakūṭaṃ cittakūṭaṃ kāḷakūṭaṃ gandhamādanakūṭaṃ kelāsakūṭanti imehi pañcahi pabbatehi parikkhitto. tattha sudassanakūṭaṃ sovaṇṇamayaṃ dviyojanasatubbedhaṃ antovaṅkaṃ kākamukhasaṇṭhānaṃ tameva saraṃ paṭicchādetvā tiṭṭhati, cittakūṭaṃ sabbaratanamayaṃ, kāḷakūṭaṃ añjanamayaṃ, gandhamādanakūṭaṃ sānumayaṃ abbhantare muggavaṇṇaṃ, mūlagandho sāragandho pheggugandho tacagandho papaṭikāgandho rasagandho pattagandho pupphagandho phalagandho ^a^M3.0219^ea^ gandhagandhoti imehi dasahi gandhehi ussannaṃ, nānappakāraosadhasañchannaṃ kāḷapakkhauposathadivase ādittamiva aṅgāraṃ jalantaṃ tiṭṭhati, kelāsakūṭaṃ rajatamayaṃ. sabbāni sudassanena samānubbedhasaṇṭhānāni tameva saraṃ paṭicchādetvā ṭhitāni. tāni sabbāni devānubhāvena nāgānubhāvena ca vassanti, nadiyo cetesu sandanti. taṃ sabbampi udakaṃ anotattameva pavisati. candimasūriyā dakkhiṇena vā uttarena vā gacchantā pabbatantarena tattha obhāsaṃ karonti, ujuṃ gacchantā na karonti. tenevassa anotatto tisaṅkhā udapādi.

[03] tattha manoharasilātalāni nimmacchakacchapāni phalikasadisanimmalodakāni nhānatitthāni supaṭiyattāni ^a^V3.0218^ea^ honti ^a^P4.0109^ea^, yesu buddhā khīṇāsavā ca paccekabuddhā ca iddhimantā ca isayo nhāyanti, devayakkhādayo udakakīḷaṃ kīḷanti.

[03] tassa catūsu passesu sīhamukhaṃ, hatthimukhaṃ, assamukhaṃ, usabhamukhanti cattāri mukhāni honti, yehi catasso nadiyo sandanti. sīhamukhena nikkhantanadītīre sīhā bahutarā honti, hatthimukhādīhi hatthiassausabhā. puratthimadisato nikkhantanadī anotattaṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā itarā tisso nadiyo anupagamma pācīnahimavanteneva amanussapathaṃ gantvā mahāsamuddaṃ pavisati. pacchimadisato ca uttaradisato ca nikkhantanadiyopi tatheva padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pacchimahimavanteneva uttarahimavanteneva ca amanussapathaṃ gantvā mahāsamuddaṃ pavisanti. dakkhiṇamukhato nikkhantanadī pana taṃ tikkhattuṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā uttarena ujukaṃ pāsāṇapiṭṭheneva saṭṭhi yojanāni gantvā pabbataṃ paharitvā uṭṭhāya parikkhepena tigāvutappamāṇā udakadhārā hutvā ākāsena saṭṭhi yojanāni gantvā tiyaggaḷe nāma pāsāṇe patitā, pāsāṇo udakadhārāvegena bhinno. tattha paññāsayojanappamāṇā tiyaggaḷā nāma mahāpokkharaṇī jātā, pokkharaṇiyā kūlaṃ bhinditvā pāsāṇaṃ pavisitvā saṭṭhi yojanāni gatā. tato ghanapathaviṃ bhinditvā ummaṅgena saṭṭhi yojanāni gantvā giñjhaṃ nāma tiracchānapabbataṃ paharitvā hatthatale pañcaṅgulisadisā pañca dhārā hutvā pavattati. sā ^a^M3.0220^ea^ tikkhattuṃ anotattaṃ padakkhiṇaṃ katvā gataṭṭhāne ^b^āvattagaṅgā^eb^ti vuccati ^a^P4.0110^ea^. ujukaṃ pāsāṇapiṭṭhena saṭṭhi yojanāni gataṭṭhāne ^b^kaṇhagaṅgā,^eb^ ākāsena saṭṭhi yojanāni gataṭṭhāne ^b^ākāsagaṅgā,^eb^ tiyaggaḷapāsāṇe paññāsayojanokāse ṭhitā ^b^tiyaggaḷapokkharaṇī,^eb^ kūlaṃ bhinditvā pāsāṇaṃ pavisitvā saṭṭhi yojanāni gataṭṭhāne ^b^bahalagaṅgā^eb^ti, umaṅgena saṭṭhi yojanāni gataṭṭhāne ^b^umaṅgagaṅgā^eb^ti vuccati. viñjhaṃ nāma tiracchānapabbataṃ paharitvā pañca dhārā hutvā pavattanaṭṭhāne pana gaṅgā, yamunā, aciravatī, sarabhū, mahīti pañca saṅkhaṃ gatā. evametā pañca mahānadiyo himavantato pavattantīti veditabbā.

[03] ^b^savantiyo^eb^ti yā kāci savamānā gacchantī mahānadiyo vā kunnadiyo vā. ^b^appentī^eb^ti allīyanti osaranti. ^b^dhārā^eb^ti vuṭṭhidhārā. ^b^pūratta^eb^nti puṇṇabhāvo. mahāsamuddassa hi ayaṃ dhammatā -- ``imasmiṃ kāle devo mando jāto, jālakkhipādīni ādāya macchakacchape gaṇhissāmā''ti vā ``imasmiṃ kāle mahantā vuṭṭhi, labhissāma nu kho piṭṭhipasāraṇaṭṭhāna''nti vā ^a^V3.0219^ea^ vattuṃ na sakkā. paṭhamakappikakālato paṭṭhāya hi yaṃ sinerumekhalaṃ āhacca udakaṃ ṭhitaṃ, tato ekaṅgulamattampi udakaṃ neva heṭṭhā osīdati, na uddhaṃ uttarati. ^b^ekaraso^eb^ti asambhinnaraso.

[03] ^b^muttā^eb^ti khuddakamahantavaṭṭadīghādibhedā anekavidhā ^a^P4.0111^ea^. ^b^maṇī^eb^ti rattanīlādibhedo anekavidho. ^b^veḷuriyo^eb^ti vaṃsavaṇṇasirīsapupphavaṇṇādibhedo anekavidho. ^b^saṅkho^eb^ti dakkhiṇāvaṭṭatambakucchikadhamanasaṅkhādibhedo anekavidho. ^b^silā^eb^ti setakāḷamuggavaṇṇādibhedo anekavidhā. ^b^pavāḷa^eb^nti khuddakamahantarattaghanarattādibhedaṃ anekavidhaṃ. ^b^masāragalla^eb^nti kabaramaṇi. ^b^nāgā^eb^ti ūmipiṭṭhavāsinopi vimānaṭṭhakā nāgāpi.

[03] ^b^aṭṭha pahārādā^eb^ti satthā aṭṭhapi dhamme vattuṃ sakkoti, soḷasapi bāttiṃsapi catusaṭṭhipi sahassampi, pahārādena pana aṭṭha kathitā, ahampi teheva sarikkhake katvā kathessāmīti cintetvā evamāha. ^b^anupubbasikkhā^eb^tiādīsu anupubbasikkhāya tisso sikkhā gahitā, anupubbakiriyāya terasa dhutaṅgāni, anupubbapaṭipadāya satta anupassanā aṭṭhārasa mahāvipassanā aṭṭhatiṃsa ārammaṇavibhattiyo sattatiṃsa bodhapakkhiyadhammā ^a^M3.0221^ea^. ^b^na āyatakeneva aññāpaṭivedho^eb^ti maṇḍūkassa uppatitvā gamanaṃ viya āditova sīlapūraṇādiṃ akatvā arahattappaṭivedho nāma natthi, paṭipāṭiyā pana sīlasamādhipaññāyo pūretvāva sakkā arahattaṃ pattunti attho.

[03] ^b^ārakāvā^eb^ti dūreyeva. ^b^na tena nibbānadhātuyā ūnattaṃ vā pūrattaṃ vā^eb^ti asaṅkhyeyyepi kappe buddhesu anuppannesu ekasattopi parinibbātuṃ na sakkoti, tadāpi ``tucchā nibbānadhātū''ti na ^a^P4.0112^ea^ sakkā vattuṃ. buddhakāle ca pana ekekasmiṃ samāgame asaṅkhyeyyāpi sattā amataṃ ārādhenti, tadāpi na sakkā vattuṃ -- ``pūrā nibbānadhātū''ti.

[03] 20^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^nisinno hotī^eb^ti uposathakaraṇatthāya upāsikāya ratanapāsāde nisinno. nisajja pana bhikkhūnaṃ cittāni olokento ekaṃ dussīlapuggalaṃ disvā ``sacāhaṃ imasmiṃ puggale ^a^V3.0220^ea^ nisinneyeva pātimokkhaṃ uddisissāmi, sattadhā tassa muddhā phalissatī''ti tassa anukampāya tuṇhīyeva ahosi. ^b^abhikkantā^eb^ti atikkantā parikkhīṇā. ^b^uddhaste aruṇe^eb^ti uggate aruṇasīse. ^b^nandimukhiyā^eb^ti tuṭṭhamukhiyā. ^b^aparisuddhā, ānanda, parisā^eb^ti ``asukapuggalo aparisuddho''ti avatvā ``aparisuddhā, ānanda, parisā''ti āha. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
[06] mahāvaggo dutiyo.

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ tatiyassa paṭhame ^b^paññatte āsane nisīdī^eb^ti tassa kira ghare pañcannaṃ bhikkhusatānaṃ pañca āsanasatāni niccaṃ paññattāneva honti, tesu aññatarasmiṃ āsane nisīdi. ^b^taṃ suṇāhī^eb^ti te suṇāhi, taṃ vā aṭṭhavidhaṃ acchariyadhammaṃ suṇāhi. ^b^cittaṃ pasīdī^eb^ti ``buddho nu kho na buddho nu kho''ti vitakkamattampi na uppajji, ayameva buddhoti cittuppādo pasanno anāvilo ahosi. ^b^sakāni vā ñātikulānī^eb^ti attano yāpanamattaṃ dhanaṃ ^a^M3.0222^ea^ gahetvā ñātigharāni gacchatu. ^b^kassa vo dammī^eb^ti katarapurisassa tumhe dadāmi, ārocetha me attano adhippāyaṃ. ^b^appaṭivibhattā^eb^ti ^a^P4.0113^ea^ ``ettakaṃ dassāmi ettakaṃ na dassāmi, idaṃ dassāmi idaṃ na dassāmī''ti cittaṃ uppādentena hi paṭivibhattā nāma hoti, mayhaṃ pana na evaṃ. atha kho saṅghikā viya gaṇasantakā viya ca sīlavantehi saddhiṃ sādhāraṇāyeva. ^b^sakkaccaṃyeva payirupāsāmī^eb^ti sahatthā upaṭṭhahāmi, cittīkārena upasaṅkamāmi.

[03] ^b^anacchariyaṃ kho pana maṃ, bhante^eb^ti, bhante, yaṃ maṃ devatā upasaṅkamitvā evaṃ ārocenti, idaṃ na acchariyaṃ. yaṃ panāhaṃ tatonidānaṃ cittassa uṇṇatiṃ nābhijānāmi, taṃ eva acchariyanti ^a^V3.0221^ea^ vadati. ^b^sādhu sādhu, bhikkhū^eb^ti ettha kiñcāpi bhikkhuṃ āmanteti, upāsakasseva pana veyyākaraṇasampahaṃsane esa sādhukāroti veditabbo.

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^nāgavane^eb^ti tassa kira seṭṭhino nāgavanaṃ nāma uyyānaṃ, so tattha purebhattaṃ gandhamālādīni gāhāpetvā uyyānakīḷikaṃ kīḷitukāmo gantvā paricāriyamāno bhagavantaṃ addasa. saha dassanenevassa purimanayeneva cittaṃ pasīdi, surāpānena ca uppannamando taṅkhaṇaṃyeva pahīyi. taṃ sandhāyevamāha. ^b^oṇojesi^eb^nti udakaṃ hatthe pātetvā adāsiṃ. ^b^asuko^eb^ti amuko. ^b^samacittova demī^eb^ti ``imassa thokaṃ, imassa bahuka''nti evaṃ cittanānattaṃ na karomi, deyyadhammaṃ pana ekasadisaṃ karomīti dasseti. ^b^ārocentī^eb^ti ^a^P4.0114^ea^ ākāse ṭhatvā ārocenti. ^b^natthi taṃ saṃyojana^eb^nti iminā upāsako attano anāgāmiphalaṃ byākaroti.

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^hatthako āḷavako^eb^ti bhagavatā āḷavakayakkhassa hatthato hatthehi sampaṭicchitattā hatthakoti laddhanāmo rājakumāro. ^b^sīlavā^eb^ti pañcasīladasasīlena sīlavā. ^b^cāgavā^eb^ti cāgasampanno. ^b^kaccittha, bhante^eb^ti, bhante, kacci ettha bhagavato byākaraṇaṭṭhāne. ^b^appiccho^eb^ti adhigamappicchatāya appiccho.

[03] 24^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^a^M3.0223^ea^ ^b^pañcamattehi upāsakasatehī^eb^ti sotāpannasakadāgāmīnaṃyeva ariyasāvakaupāsakānaṃ pañcahi satehi parivuto bhuttapātarāso gandhamālavilepenacuṇṇāni gahetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami. ^b^saṅgahavatthūnī^eb^ti saṅgaṇhanakāraṇāni. ^b^tehāha^eb^nti tehi ahaṃ. ^b^taṃ dānena saṅgaṇhāmī^eb^ti naṅgalabalibaddabhattabījādīni ceva gandhamālamūlādīni ca datvā saṅgaṇhāmi. ^b^peyyavajjenā^eb^ti amma, tāta, bhātara, bhaginītiādikena kaṇṇasukhena mudukena piyavacanena saṅgaṇhāmi. ^b^atthacariyāyā^eb^ti ``imassa dānena vā piyavacanena vā kiccaṃ natthi, atthacariyāya saṅgaṇhitabbayuttako ^a^V3.0222^ea^ aya''nti ñatvā uppannakiccanittharaṇasaṅkhātāya atthacariyāya saṅgaṇhāmi. ^b^samānattatāyā^eb^ti ``imassa dānādīhi kiccaṃ natthi, samānattatāya ^a^P4.0115^ea^ saṅgaṇhitabbo aya''nti ekato khādanapivananisajjādīhi attanā samānaṃ katvā saṅgaṇhāmi. ^b^daliddassa kho no tathā sotabbaṃ maññantī^eb^ti daliddassa kiñci dātuṃ vā kātuṃ vā asakkontassa, yathā daliddassa no tathā sotabbaṃ maññanti, mama pana sotabbaṃ maññanti, dinnovāde tiṭṭhanti, na me anusāsaniṃ atikkamitabbaṃ maññanti. ^b^yoni kho tyāya^eb^nti upāyo kho te ayaṃ. imesu pana dvīsupi suttesu satthārā sīlacāgapaññā missakā kathitāti veditabbā.
[03] 25-26^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^atthūpaparikkhitā hotī^eb^ti atthānatthaṃ kāraṇākāraṇaṃ upaparikkhitā hoti. chaṭṭhe saddhāsīlacāgā missakā kathitā.

[03] 27^b^.^eb^ sattame ^b^ujjhattibalā^eb^ti ujjhānabalā. bālānañhi ``yaṃ asuko idañcidañca āha, maṃ so āha, na añña''nti evaṃ ujjhānameva balaṃ. ^b^nijjhattibalā^eb^ti ``na idaṃ evaṃ, evaṃ nāmeta''nti atthānatthanijjhāpanaṃyeva balaṃ. ^b^paṭisaṅkhānabalā^eb^ti paccavekkhaṇabalā. ^b^khantibalā^eb^ti adhivāsanabalā.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^a^M3.0224^ea^ ^b^balānī^eb^ti ñāṇabalāni. ^b^āsavānaṃ khayaṃ paṭijānātī^eb^ti arahattaṃ paṭijānāti. ^b^aniccato^eb^ti hutvā abhāvākārena. ^b^yathābhūta^eb^nti yathāsabhāvato. ^b^sammappaññāyā^eb^ti sahavipassanāya maggapaññāya. ^b^aṅgārakāsūpamā^eb^ti ^a^P4.0116^ea^ santāpanaṭṭhena aṅgārakāsuyā upamitā ime kāmāti. ^b^vivekaninna^eb^nti phalasamāpattivasena nibbānaninnaṃ. ^b^vivekaṭṭha^eb^nti kilesehi vajjitaṃ dūrībhūtaṃ vā. ^b^nekkhammābhirata^eb^nti pabbajjābhirataṃ. ^b^byantibhūta^eb^nti vigatantabhūtaṃ ekadesenāpi anallīnaṃ visaṃyuttaṃ visaṃsaṭṭhaṃ. ^b^āsavaṭṭhāniyehī^eb^ti sampayogavasena āsavānaṃ kāraṇabhūtehi, kilesadhammehīti ^a^V3.0223^ea^ attho. atha vā ^b^byantibhūta^eb^nti vigatavāyanti attho. kuto? ^b^sabbaso āsavaṭṭhāniyehi dhammehi,^eb^ sabbehi tebhūmakadhammehīti attho. imasmiṃ sutte ariyamaggo lokiyalokuttaro kathito.

[03] 29^b^.^eb^ navame khaṇe kiccāni karotīti ^b^khaṇakicco,^eb^ okāsaṃ labhitvāva kiccāni karotīti attho. ^b^dhammo^eb^ti catusaccadhammo. ^b^opasamiko^eb^ti kilesūpasamāvaho. ^b^parinibbāyiko^eb^ti kilesaparinibbānakaro. catumaggañāṇasaṅkhātaṃ sambodhiṃ gacchati sampāpuṇātīti ^b^sambodhagāmī. dīghāyukaṃ devanikāya^eb^nti idaṃ asaññaṃ devanikāyaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ. ^b^aviññātāresū^eb^ti ativiya aviññūsu.

[03] ^b^suppavedite^eb^ti sukathite. ^b^antarāyikā^eb^ti antarāyakarā. ^b^khaṇo ve mā upaccagā^eb^ti ayaṃ laddho khaṇo mā atikkami. ^b^idha^eb^ ^a^P4.0117^ea^ ^b^ceva naṃ virādhetī^eb^ti sace koci pamattacārī idha imaṃ khaṇaṃ labhitvāpi saddhammassa niyāmataṃ ariyamaggaṃ virādheti na sampādeti. ^b^atītattho^eb^ti hāpitattho. ^b^cirattaṃ anutapissatī^eb^ti cirarattaṃ socissati. yathā hi ``asukaṭṭhāne bhaṇḍaṃ samuppanna''nti sutvā eko vāṇijo na gaccheyya, aññe gantvā gaṇheyyuṃ, tesaṃ taṃ aṭṭhaguṇampi dasaguṇampi bhaveyya. atha itaro ``mama attho atikkanto''ti anutapeyya, evaṃ yo idha khaṇaṃ labhitvā appaṭipajjanto saddhammassa niyāmataṃ virādheti, so ayaṃ vāṇijova atītattho ^a^M3.0225^ea^ ciraṃ anutapissati socissati. kiñca bhiyyo ^b^avijjānivuto^eb^ti tathā. ^b^paccavidu^eb^nti paṭivijjhiṃsu. ^b^saṃvarā^eb^ti sīlasaṃvarā. ^b^māradheyyaparānuge^eb^ti māradheyyasaṅkhātaṃ saṃsāraṃ anugate. ^b^pāraṅgatā^eb^ti nibbānaṃ gatā. ^b^ye pattā āsavakkhaya^eb^nti ye arahattaṃ pattā. evamidha gāthāsu vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ.

[03] 30^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^cetīsū^eb^ti cetināmakānaṃ rājūnaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānattā evaṃladdhavohāre raṭṭhe. ^b^pācīnavaṃsadāye^eb^ti dasabalassa vasanaṭṭhānato pācīnadisāya ^a^P4.0118^ea^ ṭhite vaṃsadāye nīlobhāsehi veḷūhi sañchanne ^a^V3.0224^ea^ araññe. ^b^evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādī^eb^ti thero kira pabbajitvā paṭhamāntovassamhiyeva samāpattilābhī hutvā sahassalokadhātudassanasamatthaṃ dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ uppādesi. so sāriputtattherassa santikaṃ gantvā evamāha -- ``idhāhaṃ, āvuso sāriputta, dibbena cakkhunā visuddhena atikkantamānusakena sahassalokaṃ olokemi. āraddhaṃ kho pana me vīriyaṃ asallīnaṃ, upaṭṭhitā sati asammuṭṭhā, passaddho kāyo asāraddho, samāhitaṃ cittaṃ ekaggaṃ. atha ca pana me anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ na vimuccatī''ti. atha naṃ thero āha -- ``yaṃ kho te, āvuso anuruddha, evaṃ hoti `ahaṃ dibbena cakkhunā...pe0... olokemī'ti, idaṃ te mānasmiṃ. yampi te, āvuso, anuruddha evaṃ hoti `āraddhaṃ kho pana me vīriyaṃ...pe0... ekagga'nti, idaṃ te uddhaccasmiṃ. yampi te, āvuso anuruddha, evaṃ hoti `atha ca pana me anupādāya āsavehi cittaṃ na vimuccatī'ti, idaṃ te kukkuccasmiṃ. sādhu vatāyasmā anuruddho ime tayo dhamme pahāya ime tayo dhamme amanasikaritvā amatāya dhātuyā cittaṃ upasaṃharatū''ti evamassa thero kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathesi. so kammaṭṭhānaṃ gahetvā satthāraṃ āpucchitvā cetiraṭṭhaṃ gantvā samaṇadhammaṃ karonto aṭṭhamāsaṃ caṅkamena vītināmesi. so padhānaveganimmathitattā kilantakāyo ekassa veḷugumbassa heṭṭhā nisīdi. athassāyaṃ evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi, esa mahāpurisavitakko uppajjīti attho.

[03] ^b^appicchassā^eb^ti ^a^M3.0226^ea^ ettha paccayappiccho, adhigamappiccho, pariyattiappiccho, dhutaṅgappicchoti cattāro appicchā. tattha ^a^P4.0119^ea^ paccayappiccho bahuṃ dente appaṃ gaṇhāti, appaṃ dente appataraṃ gaṇhāti, na anavasesaggāhī hoti. adhigamappiccho majjhantikatthero viya attano adhigamaṃ aññesaṃ jānituṃ na deti. pariyattiappiccho tepiṭakopi samāno na bahussutabhāvaṃ jānāpetukāmo hoti sāketatissatthero viya. dhutaṅgappiccho dhutaṅgapariharaṇabhāvaṃ aññesaṃ jānituṃ na deti dvebhātikattheresu jeṭṭhatthero viya. vatthu visuddhimagge kathitaṃ. ^b^ayaṃ dhammo^eb^ti evaṃ santaguṇaniguhanena ca paṭiggahaṇe mattaññutāya ca appicchassa puggalassa ayaṃ navalokuttaradhammo sampajjati, no mahicchassa. evaṃ sabbattha yojetabbaṃ.

[03] ^b^santuṭṭhassā^eb^ti catūsu paccayesu tīhi santosehi santuṭṭhassa. ^b^pavivittassā^eb^ti kāyacittaupadhivivekehi vivittassa. tattha kāyaviveko nāma gaṇasaṅgaṇikaṃ vinodetvā ārambhavatthuvasena ekībhāvo. ekībhāvamatteneva kammaṃ na nipphajjatīti kasiṇaparikammaṃ katvā aṭṭha samāpattiyo ^a^V3.0225^ea^ nibbatteti, ayaṃ cittaviveko nāma. samāpattimatteneva kammaṃ na nipphajjatīti jhānaṃ pādakaṃ katvā saṅkhāre sammasitvā saha paṭisambhidāhi arahattaṃ pāpuṇāti, ayaṃ sabbākārato upadhiviveko nāma. tenāha bhagavā -- ``kāyaviveko ca vivekaṭṭhakāyānaṃ nekkhammābhiratānaṃ, cittaviveko ca parisuddhacittānaṃ paramavodānappattānaṃ, upadhiviveko ca nirupadhīnaṃ puggalānaṃ visaṅkhāragatāna''nti (mahāni0 7, 49).

[03] ^b^saṅgaṇikārāmassā^eb^ti ^a^P4.0120^ea^ gaṇasaṅgaṇikāya ceva kilesasaṅgaṇikāya ca ratassa. ^b^āraddhavīriyassā^eb^ti kāyikacetasikavīriyavasena āraddhavīriyassa. ^b^upaṭṭhitassatissā^eb^ti catusatipaṭṭhānavasena upaṭṭhitassatissa. ^b^samāhitassā^eb^ti ekaggacittassa. ^b^paññavato^eb^ti kammassakatapaññāya paññavato.

[03] ^b^sādhu sādhū^eb^ti therassa vitakkaṃ sampahaṃsento evamāha. ^b^imaṃ aṭṭhama^eb^nti satta nidhī laddhapurisassa aṭṭhamaṃ dento viya, satta maṇiratanāni, satta hatthiratanāni, satta assaratanāni laddhapurisassa aṭṭhamaṃ dento viya satta mahāpurisavitakke vitakketvā ṭhitassa aṭṭhamaṃ ācikkhanto evamāha. ^b^nippapañcārāmassā^eb^ti ^a^M3.0227^ea^ taṇhāmānadiṭṭhipapañcarahitattā nippapañcasaṅkhāte nibbānapade abhiratassa. itaraṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^papañcārāmassā^eb^ti yathāvuttesu papañcesu abhiratassa. itaraṃ tasseva vevacanaṃ.

[03] ^b^yato^eb^ti yadā. ^b^tato^eb^ti tadā. ^b^nānārattāna^eb^nti nilapītalohitodātavaṇṇehi nānārajanehi rattānaṃ. ^b^paṃsukūla^eb^nti tevīsatiyā khettesu ṭhitapaṃsukūlacīvaraṃ. ^b^khāyissatī^eb^ti yathā tassa pubbaṇhasamayādīsu yasmiṃ samaye yaṃ icchati, tasmiṃ samaye taṃ pārupantassa so dussakaraṇḍako manāpo hutvā khāyati, evaṃ tuyhampi cīvarasantosamahāariyavaṃsena tuṭṭhassa viharato paṃsukūlacīvaraṃ khāyissati upaṭṭhahissati. ^b^ratiyā^eb^ti ratiatthāya. ^b^aparitassāyā^eb^ti taṇhādiṭṭhiparitassanāhi aparitassanatthāya. ^b^phāsuvihārāyā^eb^ti ^a^P4.0121^ea^ sukhavihāratthāya. ^b^okkamanāya nibbānassā^eb^ti amataṃ nibbānaṃ otaraṇatthāya.

[03] ^b^piṇḍiyālopabhojana^eb^nti gāmanigamarājadhānīsu jaṅghābalaṃ nissāya gharapaṭipāṭiyā carantena laddhapiṇḍiyālopabhojanaṃ. ^b^khāyissatī^eb^ti tassa gahapatino nānaggarasabhojanaṃ viya upaṭṭhahissati ^a^V3.0226^ea^. ^b^santuṭṭhassa viharato^eb^ti piṇḍapātasantosamahāariyavaṃsena santuṭṭhassa viharato. ^b^rukkhamūlasenāsanaṃ khāyissatī^eb^ti tassa gahapatino tebhūmakapāsāde gandhakusumavāsasugandhaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ viya rukkhamūlaṃ upaṭṭhahissati. ^b^santuṭṭhassā^eb^ti senāsanasantosamahāariyavaṃsena santuṭṭhassa. ^b^tiṇasanthārako^eb^ti tiṇehi vā paṇṇehi vā bhūmiyaṃ vā phalakapāsāṇatalāni vā aññatarasmiṃ santhatasanthato. ^b^pūtimutta^eb^nti yaṃkiñci muttaṃ. taṅkhaṇe gahitampi pūtimuttameva vuccati duggandhattā. ^b^santuṭṭhassa viharato^eb^ti gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhārasantosena santuṭṭhassa viharato.

[03] iti bhagavā catūsu ṭhānesu arahattaṃ pakkhipanto kammaṭṭhānaṃ kathetvā ``katarasenāsane nu kho vasantassa kammaṭṭhānaṃ sappāyaṃ bhavissatī''ti āvajjento ``tasmiññeva vasantassā''ti ñatvā ^b^tena hi tvaṃ, anuruddhā^eb^tiādimāha. ^b^pavivittassa viharato^eb^ti tīhi vivekehi vivittassa viharantassa. ^b^uyyojanikapaṭisaṃyutta^eb^nti ^a^P4.0122^ea^ uyyojanikeheva vacanehi paṭisaṃyuttaṃ, tesaṃ upaṭṭhānagamanakaṃyevāti attho. ^b^papañcanirodhe^eb^ti nibbānapade ^a^M3.0228^ea^. ^b^pakkhandatī^eb^ti ārammaṇakaraṇavasena pakkhandati. ^b^pasīdatī^eb^tiādīsupi ārammaṇavaseneva pasīdanasantiṭṭhanamuccanā veditabbā. iti bhagavā cetiraṭṭhe pācīnavaṃsadāye āyasmato anuruddhassa kathite aṭṭha mahāpurisavitakke puna bhesakaḷāvanamahāvihāre nisīditvā bhikkhusaṅghassa vitthārena kathesi.

[03] ^b^manomayenā^eb^ti manena nibbattitakāyopi manomayoti vuccati manena gatakāyopi, idha manena gatakāyaṃ sandhāyevamāha. ^b^yathā me ahu saṅkappo^eb^ti yathā mayhaṃ vitakko ahosi, tato uttari aṭṭhamaṃ mahāpurisavitakkaṃ dassento tato uttariṃ desayi. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
[06] gahapativaggo tatiyo.

[03] 31^b^.^eb^ catutthassa ^a^V3.0227^ea^ paṭhame ^b^āsajja dānaṃ detī^eb^ti patvā dānaṃ deti. āgataṃ disvā taṃ muhuttaṃyeva nisīdāpetvā sakkāraṃ katvā dānaṃ deti, dassāmīti na kilameti. ^b^bhayā^eb^ti ``ayaṃ adāyako akārako''ti garahabhayā, apāyabhayā vā. ^b^adāsi^eb^ ^a^P4.0123^ea^ ^b^me^eb^ti mayhaṃ pubbe esa idaṃ nāma adāsīti deti. ^b^dassati me^eb^ti anāgate idaṃ nāma dassatīti deti. ^b^sāhu dāna^eb^nti dānaṃ nāma sādhu sundaraṃ buddhādīhi paṇḍitehi pasatthanti deti. ^b^cittālaṅkāracittaparikkhāratthaṃ dānaṃ detī^eb^ti samathavipassanācittassa alaṅkāratthañceva parikkhāratthañca deti. dānañhi cittaṃ muduṃ karoti. yena laddho, so ``laddhaṃ me''ti muducitto hoti. yena dinnaṃ, sopi ``dinnaṃ mayā''ti muducitto hoti. iti ubhinnaṃ cittaṃ muduṃ karoti. teneva ``adantadamana''nti vuccati. yathāha --
[21] ``adantadamanaṃ ^a^M3.0229^ea^ dānaṃ, adānaṃ dantadūsakaṃ.
[22] dānena piyavācāya, unnamanti namanti cā''ti..
[03] imesu pana aṭṭhasu dānesu cittālaṅkāradānameva uttamanti.

[03] 32^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^saddhā^eb^ti yāya saddhāya dānaṃ deti, sā saddhā. ^b^hiriya^eb^nti yāya hiriyā dānaṃ deti, sāva adhippetā. ^b^kusalañca dāna^eb^nti anavajjañca dānaṃ. ^b^diviya^eb^nti divaṅgamaṃ.

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^dānavatthūnī^eb^ti dānakāraṇāni. ^b^chandā dānaṃ detī^eb^ti pemena dānaṃ deti. ^b^dosā^eb^ti ^a^V3.0228^ea^ dosena kuddho hutvā yaṃ atthi, taṃ vegena gaṇhitvā deti. ^b^mohā^eb^ti mohena mūḷho deti. ^b^bhayā^eb^ti garahabhayena vā apāyabhayena vā, tassa tasseva vā pana bhayena deti. ^b^kulavaṃsa^eb^nti kulapaveṇiṃ.

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^a^P4.0124^ea^ ^b^na mahapphalaṃ hotī^eb^ti dhaññaphalena mahapphalaṃ na hoti. ^b^na mahassāda^eb^nti yampissa phalaṃ hoti, tassa assādo na mahā hoti mandassādaṃ na madhuraṃ. ^b^na phātiseyya^eb^nti seyyāpissa na hoti vuḍḍhi, tassa mahantaṃ vīhithambhasannivesaṃ na hotīti attho. ^b^unnāmaninnāmī^eb^ti thalaninnavasena visamatalaṃ. tattha thale udakaṃ na saṇṭhāti, ninne atibahu tiṭṭhati. ^b^pāsāṇasakkharika^eb^nti pattharitvā ṭhitapiṭṭhipāsāṇehi ca khuddakapāsāṇehi ca sakkharāhi ca samannāgataṃ. ^b^ūsara^eb^nti ubbhinnaloṇaṃ. ^b^na ca gambhīrasita^eb^nti thaddhabhūmitāya gambhīrānugataṃ, naṅgalamaggaṃ katvā kasituṃ na sakkā hoti, uttānanaṅgalamaggameva hoti. ^b^na āyasampanna^eb^nti na udakāgamanasampannaṃ. ^b^na apāyasampanna^eb^nti pacchābhāge udakaniggamanamaggasampannaṃ na hoti. ^b^na mātikāsampanna^eb^nti na khuddakamahantīhi udakamātikāhi sampannaṃ hoti ^a^M3.0230^ea^. ^b^na mariyādasampanna^eb^nti na kedāramariyādāhi sampannaṃ. ^b^na mahapphala^eb^ntiādīni sabbāni vipākaphalavaseneva veditabbāni.

[03] ^b^sampanne^eb^ti paripuṇṇe sampattiyutte. ^b^pavuttā bījasampadā^eb^ti sampannaṃ bījaṃ ropitaṃ. ^b^deve^eb^ ^a^P4.0125^ea^ ^b^sampādayantamhī^eb^ti deve sammā vassante. ^b^anītisampadā hotī^eb^ti kīṭakimiādipāṇakaītiyā abhāvo ekā sampadā hoti. ^b^virūḷhī^eb^ti vaḍḍhi dutiyā sampadā hoti. ^b^vepulla^eb^nti vipulabhāvo tatiyā sampadā hoti. ^b^phala^eb^nti paripuṇṇaphalaṃ catutthī sampadā hoti. ^b^sampannasīlesū^eb^ti paripuṇṇasīlesu. ^b^bhojanasampadā^eb^ti sampannaṃ vividhabhojanaṃ. ^b^sampadāna^eb^nti tividhaṃ kusalasampadaṃ. ^b^upanetī^eb^ti sā bhojanasampadā upanayati. kasmā? ^b^sampannañhissa taṃ kataṃ,^eb^ yasmāssa taṃ katakammaṃ sampannaṃ paripuṇṇanti attho. ^b^sampannatthūdhā^eb^ti sampanno atthu idha. ^b^vijjācaraṇasampanno^eb^ti tīhi vijjāhi ca pañcadasahi caraṇadhammehi ca samannāgato. ^b^laddhā^eb^ti evarūpo puggalo cittassa sampadaṃ avekallaparipuṇṇabhāvaṃ labhitvā. ^b^karoti kammasampada^eb^nti paripuṇṇakammaṃ karoti. ^b^labhati catthasampada^eb^nti atthañca paripuṇṇaṃ labhati. ^b^diṭṭhisampada^eb^nti vipassanādiṭṭhiṃ. ^b^maggasampada^eb^nti sotāpattimaggaṃ. ^b^yāti sampannamānaso^eb^ti paripuṇṇacitto hutvā arahattaṃ ^a^V3.0229^ea^ yāti. ^b^sā hoti sabbasampadā^eb^ti sā sabbadukkhehi vimutti sabbasampadā nāma hotīti.

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^a^P4.0126^ea^ ^b^dānūpapattiyo^eb^ti dānapaccayā upapattiyo. ^b^dahatī^eb^ti ṭhapeti. ^b^adhiṭṭhātī^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ. ^b^bhāvetī^eb^ti vaḍḍheti. ^b^hīne vimutta^eb^nti hīnesu pañcasu kāmaguṇesu vimuttaṃ. ^b^uttari abhāvita^eb^nti tato uttarimaggaphalatthāya abhāvitaṃ. ^b^tatrūpapattiyā saṃvattatī^eb^ti yaṃ ṭhānaṃ patthetvā kusalaṃ kataṃ, tattha nibbattanatthāya saṃvattati. ^b^vītarāgassā^eb^ti maggena vā samucchinnarāgassa samāpattiyā vā vikkhambhitarāgassa. dānamatteneva hi brahmaloke nibbattituṃ na sakkā, dānaṃ pana samādhivipassanācittassa alaṅkāraparivāraṃ hoti. tato dānena muducitto brahmavihāre bhāvetvā brahmaloke nibbattati. tena vuttaṃ -- ``vītarāgassa no sarāgassā''ti.

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^a^M3.0231^ea^ puññakiriyāni ca tāni tesaṃ tesaṃ ānisaṃsānaṃ vatthūni cāti ^b^puññakiriyavatthūni^eb^. dānādīnañhi lakkhaṇe cittaṃ ṭhapetvā ``evarūpaṃ nāma amhehi dānaṃ dātabbaṃ, sīlaṃ rakkhitabbaṃ, bhāvanā bhāvetabbā''ti sattā puññāni karonti. dānameva ^b^dānamayaṃ,^eb^ dānacetanāsu vā purimacetanāto nipphannā sanniṭṭhāpakacetanā ^b^dānamayaṃ^eb^ sīlādīhi sīlamayādīni viya. sesadvayesupi eseva nayo. ^b^parittaṃ kataṃ hotī^eb^ti thokaṃ mandaṃ kataṃ hoti. ^b^nābhisambhotī^eb^ti na nipphajjati. ^b^akataṃ hotī^eb^ti bhāvanāyayogoyeva anāraddho hotīti attho. ^b^manussadobhagya^eb^nti ^a^P4.0127^ea^ manussesu sampattirahitaṃ pañcavidhaṃ nīcakulaṃ. ^b^upapajjatī^eb^ti paṭisandhivasena upagacchati, tattha nibbattatīti attho. ^b^mattaso kata^eb^nti pamāṇena kataṃ, thokaṃ na bahu. ^b^manussasobhagya^eb^nti manussesu subhagabhāvaṃ tividhakulasampattiṃ. ^b^adhimatta^eb^nti adhikappamāṇaṃ balavaṃ vā. ^b^adhigaṇhantī^eb^ti abhibhavitvā gaṇhanti, visiṭṭhatarā jeṭṭhakā hontīti attho.

[03] 37^b^.^eb^ sattame ^a^V3.0230^ea^ ^b^suci^eb^nti parisuddhaṃ vaṇṇasampannaṃ deti. ^b^paṇīta^eb^nti rasūpapannaṃ. ^b^kālenā^eb^ti yuttapattakālena. ^b^kappiya^eb^nti yaṃ kappiyaṃ, taṃ deti. ^b^viceyya detī^eb^ti ``imassa dinnaṃ mahapphalaṃ bhavissati, imassa na mahapphala''nti evaṃ paṭiggāhakapariyesanavasena dānaṃ vā paṇidhāyavasena dānaṃ vā vicinitvā deti.

[03] 38^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^atthāyā^eb^ti atthatthāya. ^b^hitāya sukhāyā^eb^ti hitatthāya sukhatthāya. ^b^pubbapetāna^eb^nti paralokagatānaṃ ñātīnaṃ. imasmiṃ sutte anuppanne buddhe cakkavattirājāno bodhisattā paccekabuddhā labbhanti, buddhakāle buddhā ceva buddhasāvakā ca. yathāvuttānañhi etesaṃ atthāya hitāya sukhāya saṃvattanti. ^b^bahunnaṃ^eb^ ^a^P4.0128^ea^ ^b^vata atthāya, sappañño gharamāvasa^eb^nti sappañño ghare vasanto bahūnaṃ vata atthāya hoti. ^b^pubbe^eb^ti paṭhameva. ^b^pubbekatamanussara^eb^nti ^a^M3.0232^ea^ mātāpitūnaṃ pubbakāraguṇe anussaranto. ^b^sahadhammenā^eb^ti sakāraṇena paccayapūjanena pūjeti. ^b^apace brahmacārayo^eb^ti brahmacārino apacayati, nīcavuttitaṃ nesaṃ āpajjati. ^b^pesalo^eb^ti piyasīlo.
[03] 39^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^dānānī^eb^ti cetanādānāni. ^b^aggaññānī^eb^tiādīnaṃ attho heṭṭhā vuttoyeva.

[03] 40^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^pāṇātipāto^eb^ti pāṇātipātacetanā. ^b^sabbalahuso^eb^ti sabbalahuko. ^b^appāyukasaṃvattaniko^eb^ti tena parittakena kammavipākena appāyuko hoti, dinnamattāya vā paṭisandhiyā vilīyati mātukucchito nikkhantamatte vā. evarūpo hi na aññassa kassaci nissando, pāṇātipātasseva gatamaggo esoti. ^b^bhogabyasanasaṃvattaniko^eb^ti yathā kākaṇikāmattampi ^a^V3.0231^ea^ hatthe na tiṭṭhati, evaṃ bhogabyasanaṃ saṃvatteti. ^b^sapattaverasaṃvattaniko hotī^eb^ti saha sapattehi veraṃ saṃvatteti. tassa hi sapattā ca bahukā honti. yo ca naṃ passati, tasmiṃ verameva uppādeti na nibbāyati. evarūpo hi parassa rakkhitagopitabhaṇḍe aparādhassa nissando.

[03] ^b^abhūtabbhakkhānasaṃvattaniko hotī^eb^ti abhūtena abbhakkhānaṃ saṃvatteti, yena kenaci kataṃ tasseva upari patati. ^b^mittehi^eb^ ^a^P4.0129^ea^ ^b^bhedanasaṃvattaniko^eb^ti mittehi bhedaṃ saṃvatteti. yaṃ yaṃ mittaṃ karoti, so so bhijjatiyeva. ^b^amanāpasaddasaṃvattaniko^eb^ti amanāpasaddaṃ saṃvatteti. yā sā vācā kaṇṭakā kakkasā kaṭukā abhisajjanī mammacchedikā, gatagataṭṭhāne tameva suṇāti, manāpasaddasavanaṃ nāma na labhati. evarūpo pharusavācāya gatamaggo nāma. ^b^anādeyyavācāsaṃvattaniko^eb^ti aggahetabbavacanataṃ saṃvatteti, ``tvaṃ kasmā kathesi, ko hi tava vacanaṃ gahessatī''ti vattabbataṃ āpajjati. ayaṃ samphappalāpassa gatamaggo. ^b^ummattakasaṃvattaniko hotī^eb^ti ummattakabhāvaṃ ^a^M3.0233^ea^ saṃvatteti. tena hi manusso ummatto vā khittacitto vā eḷamūgo vā hoti. ayaṃ surāpānassa nissando. imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭameva kathitanti.
[06] dānavaggo catuttho.

[03] 44^b^.^eb^ pañcamassa catutthe ^b^ime cepi, vāseṭṭha, mahāsālā^eb^ti purato ṭhite dve sālarukkhe dassento parikappopamaṃ āha. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- ime tāva mahāsālā acetanā. sace etepi sacetanā hutvā aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgataṃ uposathaṃ upavaseyyuṃ, etesampi so uposathavāso dīgharattaṃ hitāya sukhāya assa. bhūte pana vattabbameva natthīti.

[03] 46^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^a^V3.0232^ea^ ^b^yenāyasmā anuruddho^eb^ti tā kira devatā attano sampattiṃ oloketvā ``kiṃ nu kho nissāya ayaṃ sampatti amhehi laddhā''ti āvajjamānā theraṃ disvā ``mayaṃ ^a^P4.0130^ea^ amhākaṃ ayyassa pubbe cakkavattirajjaṃ karontassa pādaparicārikā hutvā tena dinnovāde ṭhatvā imaṃ sampattiṃ labhimha, gacchāma theraṃ ānetvā imaṃ sampattiṃ anubhavissāmā''ti divā yenāyasmā anuruddho tenupasaṅkamiṃsu. ^b^tīsu ṭhānesū^eb^ti tīsu kāraṇesu. ^b^ṭhānaso paṭilabhāmā^eb^ti khaṇeneva labhāma. ^b^sara^eb^nti vacanasaddaṃ vā gītasaddaṃ vā ābharaṇasaddaṃ vā. ^b^pītā assū^eb^tiādīni nīlā tāva jātā, pītā bhavituṃ na sakkhissantītiādinā nayena cintetvā vitakketi. tāpi ``idāni ayyo amhākaṃ pītabhāvaṃ icchati, idāni lohitabhāva''nti tādisāva ahesuṃ.

[03] ^b^accharaṃ vādesī^eb^ti pāṇitalaṃ vādesi. ^b^pañcaṅgikassā^eb^ti ātataṃ, vitataṃ, ātatavitataṃ, ghanaṃ, susiranti imehi pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgatassa. tattha ātataṃ nāma cammapariyonaddhesu bheriādīsu ekatalatūriyaṃ, vitataṃ nāma ubhayatalaṃ, ātatavitataṃ nāma sabbaso ^a^M3.0234^ea^ pariyonaddhaṃ, susiraṃ vaṃsādi, ghanaṃ sammādi. ^b^suvinītassā^eb^ti ākaḍḍhanasithilakaraṇādīhi samucchitassa. ^b^suppaṭipatāḷitassā^eb^ti pamāṇe ṭhitabhāvajānanatthaṃ suṭṭhu paṭipatāḷitassa. ^b^kusalehi susamannāhatassā^eb^ti ye vādetuṃ kusalā chekā, tehi vāditassa. ^b^vaggū^eb^ti cheko sundaro. ^b^rajanīyo^eb^ti rañjetuṃ samattho. ^b^kamanīyo^eb^ti kāmetabbayutto. khamanīyoti ^a^P4.0131^ea^ vā pāṭho, divasampi suyyamāno khamateva, na nibbindatīti attho. ^b^madanīyo^eb^ti mānamadapurisamadajanano. ^b^indriyāni okkhipī^eb^ti ``asāruppaṃ imā devatā karontī''ti indriyāni heṭṭhā khipi, na akkhīni ummīletvā olokesi. ^b^na khvayyo anuruddho sādiyatī^eb^ti ``mayaṃ naccāma gāyāma, ayyo pana anuruddho na kho sādiyati, akkhīni ummīletvā na oloketi, kiṃ mayaṃ naccitvā vā gāyitvā vā karissāmā''ti tattheva antaradhāyiṃsu. ^b^yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamī^eb^ti tāsaṃ devatānaṃ ānubhāvaṃ disvā ``katihi nu kho dhammehi samannāgato mātugāmo manāpakāyike devaloke nibbattatī''ti imamatthaṃ pucchituṃ upasaṅkami.

[03] 49-50^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^V3.0233^ea^ ^b^ayaṃ'sa loko āraddho hotī^eb^ti ayamassa loko idhaloke karaṇamattāya āraddhattā paripuṇṇattā āraddho hoti paripuṇṇo. ^b^soḷasākārasampannā^eb^ti sutte vuttehi aṭṭhahi, gāthāsu aṭṭhahīti soḷasahi ākārehi samannāgatā, yāni vā aṭṭhaṅgāni parampi tesu samādapetīti evampi soḷasākārasampannāti eke. saddhāsīlapaññā panettha missikā kathitā. dasamaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa kathitaṃ. sabbasuttesu pana yaṃ na vuttaṃ, taṃ heṭṭhā āgatanayattā uttānatthamevāti.
[06] uposathavaggo pañcamo.
[06] paṭhamapaṇṇāsakaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
