[03] 51^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhassa ^a^V3.0234^ea^ ^a^M3.0235^ea^ ^a^P4.0132^ea^ paṭhame ^b^sakkesu viharatī^eb^ti paṭhamagamanena gantvā viharati. ^b^mahāpajāpatī^eb^ti puttapajāya ceva dhītupajāya ca mahantattā evaṃladdhanāmā. ^b^yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamī^eb^ti bhagavā kapilapuraṃ gantvā paṭhamameva nandaṃ pabbājesi, sattame divase rāhulakumāraṃ. ^b^cumbaṭakakalahe^eb^ (dī0 ni0 aṭṭha0 2.331; saṃ0 ni0 aṭṭha0 1.1.37) pana ubhayanagaravāsikesu yuddhatthāya nikkhantesu satthā gantvā te rājāno saññāpetvā ^b^attadaṇḍasuttaṃ^eb^ (su0 ni0 941 ādayo; mahāni0 170 ādayo) kathesi. rājāno pasīditvā aḍḍhatiyasate aḍḍhatiyasate kumāre adaṃsu, tāni pañca kumārasatāni satthu santike pabbajiṃsu, atha nesaṃ pajāpatiyo sāsanaṃ pesetvā anabhiratiṃ uppādayiṃsu. satthā tesaṃ anabhiratiyā uppannabhāvaṃ ñatvā te pañcasate daharabhikkhū kuṇāladahaṃ netvā attano kuṇālakāle nisinnapubbe pāsāṇatale nisīditvā ^b^kuṇālajātakakathāya^eb^ (jā0 2.21.kuṇālajātaka) tesaṃ anabhiratiṃ vinodetvā sabbepi te sotāpattiphale patiṭṭhāpesi, puna mahāvanaṃ ānetvā arahattaphaleti. tesaṃ cittajānanatthaṃ punapi pajāpatiyo sāsanaṃ pahiṇiṃsu. te ``abhabbā mayaṃ gharāvāsassā''ti paṭisāsanaṃ pahiṇiṃsu. tā ``na dāni amhākaṃ gharaṃ gantuṃ yuttaṃ, mahāpajāpatiyā santikaṃ gantvā pabbajjaṃ anujānāpetvā pabbajissāmā''ti pañcasatāpi mahāpajāpatiṃ upasaṅkamitvā ``ayye, amhākaṃ pabbajjaṃ anujānāpethā''ti āhaṃsu. mahāpajāpatī tā itthiyo gahetvā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami. setacchattassa heṭṭhā rañño parinibbutakāle upasaṅkamītipi vadantiyeva.

[03] ^b^alaṃ gotami, mā te ruccī^eb^ti kasmā paṭikkhipi, nanu sabbesampi buddhānaṃ catasso parisā ^a^V3.0235^ea^ hontīti? kāmaṃ honti, kilametvā pana anekavāraṃ yācite anuññātaṃ pabbajjaṃ ^a^P4.0133^ea^ ``dukkhena laddhā''ti sammā paripālessantīti garuṃ katvā anuññātukāmo paṭikkhipi. ^b^pakkāmī^eb^ti puna kapilapurameva pāvisi. ^b^yathābhirantaṃ^eb^ ^a^M3.0236^ea^ ^b^viharitvā^eb^ti bodhaneyyasattānaṃ upanissayaṃ olokento yathājjhāsayane viharitvā. ^b^cārikaṃ pakkāmī^eb^ti mahājanasaṅgahaṃ karonto uttamāya buddhasiriyā anopamena buddhavilāsena aturitacārikaṃ pakkāmi.

[03] ^b^sambahulāhi sākiyānīhi saddhi^eb^nti antonivesanamhiyeva dasabalaṃ uddissa pabbajjāvesaṃ gahetvā pañcasatā sākiyāniyo pabbajjāvesaṃyeva gāhāpetvā sabbāhipi tāhi sambahulāhi sākiyānīhi saddhiṃ. ^b^cārikaṃ pakkāmī^eb^ti gamanaṃ abhinīhari. gamanābhinīharaṇakāle pana tā sukhumālā rājitthiyo padasā gantuṃ na sakkhissantīti sākiyakoliyarājāno sovaṇṇasivikāyo upaṭṭhāpayiṃsu. tā pana ``yāne āruyha gacchantīti satthari agāravo kato hotī''ti ekapaṇṇāsayojanikaṃ padasāva paṭipajjiṃsu. rājānopi purato ca pacchato ca ārakkhaṃ saṃvidahāpetvā taṇḍulasappitelādīnaṃ sakaṭāni pūrāpetvā ``gataṭṭhāne gataṭṭhāne āhāraṃ paṭiyādethā''ti purise pesayiṃsu. ^b^sūnehi pādehī^eb^ti tāsañhi sukhumālattā pādesu eko phoṭo uṭṭheti, eko bhijjati. ubho pādā katakaṭṭhisamparikiṇṇā viya hutvā uddhumātā jātā. tena vuttaṃ -- ``sūnehi pādehī''ti. ^b^bahidvārakoṭṭhake^eb^ti dvārakoṭṭhakato bahi. kasmā panevaṃ ^a^P4.0134^ea^ ṭhitāti? evaṃ kirassā ahosi -- ``ahaṃ tathāgatena ananuññātā sayameva pabbajjāvesaṃ aggahesiṃ, evaṃ gahitabhāvo ca pana me sakalajambudīpe pākaṭo jāto. sace satthā pabbajjaṃ anujānāti, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. sace pana nānujānissati, mahatī garahā bhavissatī''ti vihāraṃ pavisituṃ asakkontī rodamānāva aṭṭhāsi.

[03] ^b^kiṃ nu tvaṃ gotamī^eb^ti kiṃ nu rājakulānaṃ vipatti uppannā, kena tvaṃ kāraṇena evaṃ vivaṇṇabhāvaṃ pattā, sūnehi pādehi...pe0... ṭhitāti. ^b^aññenapi pariyāyenā^eb^ti aññenapi kāraṇena. ^b^bahukārā, bhante^eb^tiādinā tassā guṇaṃ kathetvā puna pabbajjaṃ yācanto evamāha. satthāpi ``itthiyo nāma parittapaññā, ekayācitamattena pabbajjāya anuññātāya na mama sāsanaṃ garuṃ katvā gaṇhissantī''ti tikkhattuṃ paṭikkhipitvā idāni garuṃ katvā gāhāpetukāmatāya ^b^sace, ānanda, mahāpajāpatī gotamī^eb^ ^a^M3.0237^ea^ ^b^aṭṭha garudhamme paṭiggaṇhāti, sāva'ssā hotu^eb^ ^a^V3.0236^ea^ ^b^upasampadā^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^sāvassā^eb^ti sā eva assā pabbajjāpi upasampadāpi hotu.

[03] ^b^tadahūpasampannassā^eb^ti taṃdivasaṃ upasampannassa. ^b^abhivādanaṃ paccuṭṭhānaṃ añjalikammaṃ sāmīcikammaṃ kattabba^eb^nti omānātimāne akatvā pañcapatiṭṭhitena abhivādanaṃ, āsanā paccuṭṭhāya paccuggamanavasena paccuṭṭhānaṃ, dasanakhe samodhānetvā añjalikammaṃ, āsanapaññāpanabījanādikaṃ anucchavikakammasaṅkhātaṃ ^a^P4.0135^ea^ sāmīcikammañca katabbaṃ. ^b^abhikkhuke āvāse^eb^ti yattha vasantiyā anantarāyena ovādatthāya upasaṅkamanaṭṭhāne ovādadāyako ācariyo natthi, ayaṃ abhikkhuko āvāso nāma. evarūpe āvāse vassaṃ na upagantabbaṃ. ^b^anvaḍḍhamāsa^eb^nti anuposathikaṃ. ^b^ovādūpasaṅkamana^eb^nti ovādatthāya upasaṅkamanaṃ. ^b^diṭṭhenā^eb^ti cakkhunā diṭṭhena. ^b^sutenā^eb^ti sotena sutena. ^b^parisaṅkāyā^eb^ti diṭṭhasutavasena parisaṅkitena. ^b^garudhamma^eb^nti garukaṃ saṅghādisesāpattiṃ. ^b^pakkhamānatta^eb^nti anūnāni pannarasa divasāni mānattaṃ. ^b^chasu dhammesū^eb^ti vikālabhojanacchaṭṭhesu sikkhāpadesu. ^b^sikkhitasikkhāyā^eb^ti ekasikkhampi akhaṇḍaṃ katvā pūritasikkhāya. ^b^akkositabbo paribhāsitabbo^eb^ti dasannaṃ akkosavatthūnaṃ aññatarena akkosavatthunā na akkositabbo, bhayūpadaṃsanāya yāya kāyaci paribhāsāya na paribhāsitabbo.

[03] ^b^ovaṭo bhikkhunīnaṃ bhikkhūsu vacanapatho^eb^ti ovādānusāsanadhammakathāsaṅkhāto vacanapatho bhikkhunīnaṃ bhikkhūsu ovarito pihito, na bhikkhuniyā koci bhikkhu ovaditabbo anusāsitabbo vā ``bhante, porāṇakattherā idaṃ cīvaravattaṃ pūrayiṃsū''ti evaṃ pana paveṇivasena kathetuṃ vaṭṭati. ^b^anovaṭo^eb^ ^a^P4.0136^ea^ ^b^bhikkhūnaṃ bhikkhunīsu vacanapatho^eb^ti bhikkhūnaṃ pana bhikkhunīsu vacanapatho anivārito, yathāruci ovadituṃ anusāsituṃ dhammakathaṃ kathetunti ayamettha saṅkhepo, vitthārato panesā garudhammakathā samantapāsādikāya vinayasaṃvaṇṇanāya (pāci0 aṭṭha0 148) vuttanayeneva veditabbā.

[03] ime pana aṭṭha garudhamme satthu santike uggahetvā therena attano ārociyamāne sutvāva mahāpajāpatiyā tāva mahantaṃ domanassaṃ khaṇena ^a^M3.0238^ea^ paṭippassambhi, anotattadahato ābhatena sītudakassa ghaṭasatena matthake parisittā viya vigatapariḷāhā attamanā hutvā garudhammapaṭiggahaṇena ^a^V3.0237^ea^ uppannapītipāmojjaṃ āvikarontī ^b^seyyathāpi, bhante^eb^tiādikaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.

[03] ^b^kumbhatthenakehī^eb^ti kumbhe dīpaṃ jāletvā tena ālokena paraghare bhaṇḍaṃ vicinitvā thenakacorehi. ^b^setaṭṭhikā nāma rogajātī^eb^ti eko pāṇako nāḷamajjhagataṃ kaṇḍaṃ vijjhati, yena viddhā kaṇḍā nikkhantampi sālisīsaṃ khīraṃ gahetuṃ na sakkoti. ^b^mañjiṭṭhikā nāma rogajātī^eb^ti ucchūnaṃ antorattabhāvo.

[03] ^b^mahato taḷākassa paṭikacceva āḷi^eb^nti iminā pana etamatthaṃ dasseti -- yathā mahato taḷākassa pāḷiyā abaddhāyapi kiñci udakaṃ tiṭṭhateva, paṭhamameva baddhāya pana yaṃ abaddhapaccayā na tiṭṭheyya, tampi tiṭṭheyya, evameva ye ime anuppanne vatthusmiṃ paṭikacceva anatikkamanatthāya garudhammā paññattā, tesu apaññattesu mātugāmassa pabbajitattā pañca vassasatāni saddhammo ^a^P4.0137^ea^ tiṭṭheyya. paṭikacceva paññattattā pana aparānipi pañca vassasatāni ṭhassatīti evaṃ paṭhamaṃ vuttavassasahassameva ṭhassati. ^b^vassasahassa^eb^nti cetaṃ paṭisambhidāpabhedappattakhīṇāsavānaṃ vaseneva vuttaṃ, tato pana uttaripi sukkhavipassakakhīṇāsavavasena vassasahassaṃ, anāgāmivasena vassasahassaṃ, sakadāgāmivasena vassasahassaṃ, sotāpannavasena vassasahassanti evaṃ pañcavassasahassāni paṭivedhasaddhammo ṭhassati. pariyattidhammopi tāniyeva. na hi pariyattiyā asati paṭivedho atthi, nāpi pariyattiyā sati paṭivedho na hoti. liṅgaṃ pana pariyattiyā antarahitāyapi ciraṃ pavattissatīti.

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^bahussuto^eb^ti idha sakalassapi buddhavacanassa vasena bahussutabhāvo veditabbo. ^b^garudhamma^eb^nti kāyasaṃsaggaṃ. ayamettha saṅkhepo. bhikkhunovādakavinicchayo pana samantapāsādikāya (pāci0 aṭṭha0 144 ādayo) vuttanayeneva veditabbo.

[03] 53^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^a^M3.0239^ea^ ^a^V3.0238^ea^ ^b^sarāgāyā^eb^ti sarāgatthāya. ^b^virāgāyā^eb^ti virajjanatthāya. ^b^saṃyogāyā^eb^ti vaṭṭe saṃyogatthāya. ^b^visaṃyogāyā^eb^ti vaṭṭe visaṃyogabhāvatthāya. ^b^ācayāyā^eb^ti vaṭṭassa vaḍḍhanatthāya. ^b^no apacayāyā^eb^ti na vaṭṭaviddhaṃsanatthāya. ^b^dubbharatāyā^eb^ti dupposanatthāya. ^b^no subharatāyā^eb^ti na sukhaposanatthāya. imasmiṃ sutte paṭhamavārena vaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ, dutiyavārena vivaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ. iminā ca pana ovādena gotamī arahattaṃ pattāti.

[03] 54^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^b^byagghapajjā^eb^ti idamassa paveṇi nāma vasena ^a^P4.0138^ea^ ālapanaṃ. tassa hi pubbapurisā byagghapathe jātāti tasmiṃ kule manussā byagghapajjāti vuccanti. ^b^issatthenā^eb^ti issāsakammena. ^b^tatrupāyāyā^eb^ti ``imasmiṃ kāle idaṃ nāma kātuṃ vaṭṭatī''ti jānane upāyabhūtāya. ^b^vuddhasīlino^eb^ti vaḍḍhitasīlā vuddhasamācārā. ^b^āya^eb^nti āgamanaṃ. ^b^nāccogāḷha^eb^nti nātimahantaṃ. ^b^nātihīna^eb^nti nātikasiraṃ. ^b^pariyādāyā^eb^ti gahetvā khepetvā. tattha yassa vayato diguṇo āyo, tassa vayo āyaṃ pariyādātuṃ na sakkoti.
[21] ``catudhā vibhaje bhoge, paṇḍito gharamāvasaṃ.
[27] ekena bhoge bhuñjeyya, dvīhi kammaṃ payojaye.
[22] catutthañca nidhāpeyya, āpadāsu bhavissatī''ti.. (dī0 ni0 3.265) --
[25] evaṃ paṭipajjato pana vayo āyaṃ pariyādātuṃ na sakkotiyeva.

[03] ^b^udumbarakhādīvā^eb^ti yathā udumbarāni khāditukāmena pakke udumbararukkhe cālite ekappahāreneva bahūni phalāni patanti, so khāditabbayuttakāni khāditvā itarāni bahutarāni pahāya gacchati, evamevaṃ yo āyato vayaṃ bahutaraṃ katvā vippakiranto bhoge paribhuñjati, so ``udumbarakhādikaṃvāyaṃ kulaputto bhoge khādatī''ti vuccati. ^b^ajeṭṭhamaraṇa^eb^nti ^a^M3.0240^ea^ anāyakamaraṇaṃ ^a^V3.0239^ea^. ^b^samaṃ jīvikaṃ kappetī^eb^ti sammā jīvikaṃ kappeti. ^b^samajīvitā^eb^ti samajīvitāya jīvitā. ^b^apāyamukhānī^eb^ti ^a^P4.0139^ea^ vināsassa ṭhānāni.

[03] ^b^uṭṭhātā kammadheyyesū^eb^ti kammakaraṇaṭṭhānesu uṭṭhānavīriyasampanno. ^b^vidhānavā^eb^ti vidahanasampanno. ^b^sotthānaṃ samparāyika^eb^nti sotthibhūtaṃ samparāyikaṃ. ^b^saccanāmenā^eb^ti buddhattāyeva buddhoti evaṃ avitathanāmena. ^b^cāgo puññaṃ pavaḍḍhatī^eb^ti cāgo ca sesapuññañca pavaḍḍhati. imasmiṃ sutte saddhādayo missakā kathitā. pañcamaṃ uttānameva.

[03] 56^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^gabbho^eb^ti gabbhavāso. ^b^diṭṭhadhammikāpī^eb^ti sandiṭṭhikā gabbhavāsasadisā punapi manussagabbhā. ^b^samparāyikāpī^eb^ti ṭhapetvā manussagabbhe sesagabbhā. ^b^ubhayaṃ ete kāmā pavuccantī^eb^ti bhayañca dukkhañca, bhayañca rogo ca, bhayañca gaṇḍo ca, bhayañca sallañca, bhayañca saṅgo ca, bhayañca paṅko ca, bhayañca gabbho cāti evaṃ ubhayaṃ ete kāmā pavuccanti. ^b^sātarūpenā^eb^ti kāmasukhena. ^b^palipatha^eb^nti vaṭṭapalipathaṃ. ^b^atikkammā^eb^ti imasmiṃ ṭhāne vipassanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā assa bhikkhuno arahattappattabhāvo gahito. evarūpaṃ pajaṃ jātijarūpetaṃ tīsu bhavesu phandamānaṃ avekkhatīti sutte vaṭṭaṃ kathetvā gāthāsu vivaṭṭaṃ kathitanti. sattamaṭṭhamāni ^a^P4.0140^ea^ uttānatthāneva.

[03] 59-60^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^ujubhūto^eb^ti kāyavaṅkādīnaṃ abhāvena ujuko. ^b^paññāsīlasamāhito^eb^ti paññāya ca sīlena ca samannāgato. ^b^yajamānāna^eb^nti dānaṃ dadantānaṃ. ^b^puññapekkhāna^eb^nti puññaṃ olokentānaṃ gavesantānaṃ ^a^M3.0241^ea^. ^b^opadhika^eb^nti upadhivipākaṃ, opadhibhūtaṃ ṭhānaṃ appamāṇaṃ. dasame ^b^samukkaṭṭho^eb^ti ukkaṭṭho uttamo. ^b^sattāna^eb^nti sabbasattānaṃ. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
[06] gotamīvaggo chaṭṭho.

[03] 61^b^.^eb^ sattamassa ^a^V3.0240^ea^ paṭhame ^b^pavivittassā^eb^ti kāyavivekena vivittassa. ^b^nirāyattavuttino^eb^ti katthaci anāyattavuttino vipassanākammikassa. ^b^lābhāyā^eb^ti catupaccayalābhāya. ^b^socī ca paridevī cā^eb^ti sokī ca paridevī ca. socicca parideviccātipi pāṭho. ^b^cuto ca saddhammā^eb^ti taṃkhaṇaṃyeva vipassanāsaddhammā cuto. imasmiṃ sutte vaṭṭavivaṭṭaṃ kathitaṃ.

[03] 62^b^.^eb^ dutiye ^b^alaṃ attano alaṃ paresa^eb^nti attano ca paresañca hitapaṭipattiyaṃ samattho pariyatto anucchaviko. ^b^khippanisantī^eb^ti ^a^P4.0141^ea^ khippaṃ upadhāreti, khandhadhātuāyatanādīsu kathiyamānesu te dhamme khippaṃ jānātīti attho. imasmiṃ sutte samathavipassanā kathitā. puggalajjhāsayena pana desanāvilāsena cetaṃ matthakato paṭṭhāya heṭṭhā otarantaṃ kathitanti.

[03] 63^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^evamevā^eb^ti nikkāraṇeneva. yathā vā ayaṃ yācati, evameva. ^b^moghapurisā^eb^ti mūḷhapurisā tucchapurisā. ^b^ajjhesantī^eb^ti yācanti. ^b^anubandhitabba^eb^nti iriyāpathānugamanena anubandhitabbaṃ maṃ na vijahitabbaṃ maññanti. ājānanatthaṃ apasādento evamāha. esa kira bhikkhu ovāde dinnepi pamādameva anuyuñjati, dhammaṃ sutvā tattheva vasati, samaṇadhammaṃ kātuṃ na icchati. tasmā bhagavā evaṃ apasādetvā puna yasmā so arahattassa upanissayasampanno ^a^M3.0242^ea^, tasmā taṃ ovadanto ^b^tasmātiha te bhikkhu evaṃ sikkhitabba^eb^ntiādimāha. tattha ^b^ajjhattaṃ me cittaṃ ṭhitaṃ bhavissati susaṇṭhitaṃ, na ca uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā cittaṃ pariyādāya ṭhassantī^eb^ti iminā tāvassa ovādena niyakajjhattavasena cittekaggatāmatto mūlasamādhi vutto.

[03] tato ^a^V3.0241^ea^ ``ettakeneva santuṭṭhiṃ anāpajjitvā evaṃ so samādhi vaḍḍhetabbo''ti dassetuṃ ^b^yato kho te bhikkhu ajjhattaṃ cittaṃ ṭhitaṃ hoti susaṇṭhitaṃ, na ca uppannā pāpakā akusalā dhammā cittaṃ pariyādāya tiṭṭhanti, tato te bhikkhu evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ^eb^ ^a^P4.0142^ea^ ^b^``mettā me cetovimutti bhāvitā bhavissati...pe0... susamāraddhā''^eb^ti evamassa mettāvasena bhāvanaṃ vaḍḍhetvā puna^b^ yato kho te bhikkhu ayaṃ samādhi evaṃ bhāvito hoti bahulīkato, tato tvaṃ bhikkhu imaṃ samādhiṃ savitakkasavicārampi bhāveyyāsī^eb^tiādi vuttaṃ. tassattho -- yadā te bhikkhu ayaṃ mūlasamādhi evaṃ mettāvasena bhāvito hoti, tadā tvaṃ tāvatakenapi tuṭṭhiṃ anāpajjitvāva imaṃ mūlasamādhiṃ aññesupi ārammaṇesu catukkapañcakajjhānāni pāpayamāno ``savitakkasavicārampī''tiādinā nayena bhāveyyāsīti.

[03] evaṃ vatvā ca pana avasesabrahmavihārapubbaṅgamampissa aññesu ārammaṇesu catukkapañcakajjhānabhāvanaṃ kareyyāsīti dassento ^b^yato kho te bhikkhu ayaṃ samādhi evaṃ bhāvito hoti subhāvito, tato te bhikkhu evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ ``karuṇā me cetovimuttī''^eb^tiādimāha. evaṃ mettāpubbaṅgamaṃ catukkapañcakajjhānabhāvanaṃ dassetvā puna kāyānupassanādipubbaṅgamaṃ dassetuṃ ^b^yato kho te bhikkhu ayaṃ samādhi evaṃ bhāvito hoti subhāvito, tato te bhikkhu evaṃ sikkhitabbaṃ ``kāye kāyānupassī''^eb^tiādiṃ vatvā ^b^yato kho te bhikkhu ayaṃ samādhi evaṃ bhāvito hoti subhāvito, tato tvaṃ bhikkhu yena yeneva gagghasī^eb^tiādimāha. tattha ^b^gagghasī^eb^ti gamissasi. ^b^phāsuṃyevā^eb^ti iminā arahattaṃ dasseti. arahattappatto hi sabbiriyāpathesu phāsu viharati nāma.

[03] 64^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^a^M3.0243^ea^ ^b^etadavocā^eb^ti attano padhānabhūmiyaṃ uppannaṃ vitakkaṃ bhikkhusaṅghassa ārocetuṃ -- ``pubbāhaṃ, bhikkhave''tiādivacanaṃ avoca. ^b^obhāsa^eb^nti ^a^P4.0143^ea^ dibbacakkhuñāṇobhāsaṃ. ^b^ñāṇadassana^eb^nti dibbacakkhubhūtaṃ ñāṇasaṅkhātaṃ dassanaṃ. ^b^sannivutthapubba^eb^nti ekato vasitapubbaṃ. imasmiṃ pana sutte dibbacakkhuñāṇaṃ, iddhividhañāṇaṃ, cetopariyañāṇaṃ, yathākammupagañāṇaṃ, anāgataṃsañāṇaṃ, paccuppannaṃsañāṇaṃ, atītaṃsañāṇaṃ, pubbenivāsañāṇanti imāni tāva aṭṭha ñāṇāni pāḷiyaṃyeva āgatāni, tehi pana saddhiṃ vipassanāñāṇāni cattāri maggañāṇāni, cattāri ^a^V3.0242^ea^ phalañāṇāni, cattāri paccavekkhaṇañāṇāni, cattāri paṭisambhidāñāṇāni cha asādhāraṇañāṇānīti etāni ñāṇāni samodhānetvā kathentena evaṃ idaṃ suttaṃ kathitaṃ nāma hoti.

[03] 65^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^b^abhibhāyatanānī^eb^ti abhibhavanakāraṇāni. kiṃ abhibhavanti? paccanīkadhammepi ārammaṇānipi. tāni hi paṭipakkhabhāvena paccanīkadhamme abhibhavanti, puggalassa ñāṇuttariyatāya ārammaṇāni. ^b^ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī^eb^tiādīsu pana ajjhattarūpe parikammavasena ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī nāma hoti. ajjhattañhi nīlaparikammaṃ karonto kese vā pitte vā akkhitārakāya vā karoti. pītaparikammaṃ karonto mede vā chaviyā vā hatthatalapādatalesu vā akkhīnaṃ pītaṭṭhāne vā karoti. lohitaparikammaṃ karonto maṃse vā lohite vā jivhāya vā akkhīnaṃ rattaṭṭhāne vā karoti. odātaparikammaṃ karonto aṭṭhimhi vā dante vā nakhe vā akkhīnaṃ setaṭṭhāne vā karoti. taṃ pana sunīlakaṃ supītakaṃ sulohitakaṃ suodātaṃ na hoti, avisuddhameva hoti.

[03] ^b^eko bahiddhā rūpāni passatī^eb^ti yassevaṃ parikammaṃ ajjhattaṃ uppannaṃ hoti, nimittaṃ pana bahiddhā, so evaṃ ajjhattaṃ ^a^P4.0144^ea^ parikammassa bahiddhā ca appanāya vasena ``ajjhattaṃ rūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passatī''ti vuccati. ^b^parittānī^eb^ti avaḍḍhitāni. ^b^suvaṇṇadubbaṇṇānī^eb^ti suvaṇṇāni vā hontu dubbaṇṇāni vā, parittavaseneva idaṃ abhibhāyatanaṃ vuttanti veditabbaṃ. ^b^tāni abhibhuyyā^eb^ti yathā nāma sampannaggahaṇiko kaṭacchumattaṃ bhattaṃ labhitvā ``kiṃ ettha bhuñjitabbaṃ ^a^M3.0244^ea^ atthī''ti saṃkaḍḍhitvā ekakabaḷameva karoti, evameva ñāṇuttariko puggalo visadañāṇo ``kimettha parittake ārammaṇe samāpajjitabbaṃ atthi, nāyaṃ mama bhāro''ti tāni rūpāni abhibhavitvā samāpajjati, saha nimittuppādenevettha appanaṃ pāpetīti attho. ^b^jānāmi passāmī^eb^ti iminā panassa ābhogo kathito. so ca kho samāpattito vuṭṭhitassa, na antosamāpattiyaṃ. ^b^evaṃsaññī hotī^eb^ti ābhogasaññāyapi jhānasaññāyapi evaṃsaññī hoti. abhibhavanasaññā hissa antosamāpattiyampi atthi, ābhogasaññā pana samāpattito vuṭṭhitasseva.

[03] ^b^appamāṇānī^eb^ti ^a^V3.0243^ea^ vaḍḍhitappamāṇāni, mahantānīti attho. ^b^abhibhuyyā^eb^ti ettha ca pana yathā mahagghaso puriso ekaṃ bhattavaḍḍhitakaṃ labhitvā ``aññāpi hotu, aññāpi hotu, kiṃ esā mayhaṃ karissatī''ti na taṃ mahantato passati, evameva ñāṇuttaro puggalo visadañāṇo ``kiṃ ettha samāpajjitabbaṃ, nayidaṃ appamāṇaṃ, na mayhaṃ cittekaggatākaraṇe ^a^P4.0145^ea^ bhāro atthī''ti abhibhavitvā samāpajjati, saha nimittuppādanevettha appanaṃ pāpetīti attho.
[03] ^b^ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī^eb^ti alābhitāya vā anatthikatāya vā ajjhattarūpe parikammasaññāvirahito.

[03] ^b^eko bahiddhā rūpāni passatī^eb^ti yassa parikammampi nimittampi bahiddhā uppannaṃ, so evaṃ bahiddhā parikammassa ceva appanāya ca vasena ``ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī eko bahiddhā rūpāni passatī''ti vuccati. sesamettha catutthābhibhāyatane ca vuttanayameva. imesu pana catūsu parittaṃ vitakkacaritavasena āgataṃ, appamāṇaṃ mohacaritavasena, suvaṇṇaṃ dosacaritavasena, dubbaṇṇaṃ rāgacaritavasena. etesañhi etāni sappāyāni. sā ca nesaṃ sappāyatā visuddhimagge (visuddhi0 1.43) cariyaniddese vuttā.

[03] pañcamābhibhāyatanādīsu ^b^nīlānī^eb^ti sabbasaṅgāhikavasena vuttaṃ. ^b^nīlavaṇṇānī^eb^ti vaṇṇavasena. ^b^nīlanidassanānī^eb^ti nidassanavasena. apaññāyamānavivarāni asambhinnavaṇṇāni ekanīlāneva hutvā dissantīti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^nīlanibhāsānī^eb^ti ^a^M3.0245^ea^ idaṃ pana obhāsavasena vuttaṃ, nīlobhāsāni nīlappabhāyuttānīti attho. etena nesaṃ suvisuddhataṃ dasseti. visuddhavaṇṇavaseneva hi imāni abhibhāyatanāni vuttāni. ``nīlakasiṇaṃ uggaṇhanto nīlasmiṃ nimittaṃ gaṇhāti pupphasmiṃ vā vatthasmiṃ vā vaṇṇadhātuyā vā''tiādikaṃ panettha kasiṇakaraṇañca ^a^P4.0146^ea^ parikammañca appanāvidhānañca sabbaṃ visuddhimagge (visuddhi0 1.55) vitthārato vuttamevāti.

[03] 66^b^.^eb^ ^b^vimokkhā^eb^ti kenaṭṭhena vimokkhā? adhimuccanaṭṭhena. ko panāyaṃ adhimuccanaṭṭho nāma? paccanīkadhammehi ca suṭṭhu muccanaṭṭho, ārammaṇe ca abhirativasena suṭṭhu muccanaṭṭho, pituaṅke ^a^V3.0244^ea^ vissaṭṭhaṅgapaccaṅgassa dārakassa sayanaṃ viya aniggahitabhāvena nirāsaṅkatāya ārammaṇe pavattīti vuttaṃ hoti. ayaṃ panattho pacchime vimokkhe natthi, purimesu vimokkhesu atthi.

[03] ^b^rūpī rūpāni passatī^eb^ti ettha ajjhattaṃ kesādīsu nīlakasiṇādivasena uppāditaṃ rūpajjhānaṃ rūpaṃ, tadassatthīti rūpī. bahiddhāpi nīlakasiṇādīni rūpāni jhānacakkhunā passati. iminā ajjhattabahiddhavatthukesu kasiṇesu uppāditajjhānassa puggalassa cattāri rūpāvacarajjhānāni dassitāni. ^b^ajjhattaṃ arūpasaññī^eb^ti ajjhattaṃ na rūpasaññī, attano kesādīsu anuppāditarūpāvacarajjhānoti attho. iminā bahiddhā parikammaṃ katvā bahiddhāva uppāditajjhānassa rūpāvacarajjhānāni dassitāni.

[03] ^b^subhanteva adhimutto hotī^eb^ti iminā suvisuddhesu nīlādīsu vaṇṇakasiṇesu jhānāni dassitāni. tattha kiñcāpi antoappanāya ``subha''nti ābhogo natthi, yo pana suvisuddhaṃ subhaṃ kasiṇaṃ ārammaṇaṃ katvā viharati, so yasmā ``subhanti adhimutto hotī''ti vattabbataṃ āpajjati, tasmā evaṃ desanā katā. paṭisambhidāmagge pana --

[02] ``kathaṃ subhanteva adhimutto hotīti vimokkho? idha bhikkhu mettāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ ^a^P4.0147^ea^...pe0... viharati. mettāya bhāvitattā sattā appaṭikūlā honti. karuṇāsahagatena...pe0... muditāsahagatena ^a^M3.0246^ea^ ...pe0... upekkhāsahagatena cetasā ekaṃ disaṃ...pe0... viharati. upekkhāya bhāvitattā sattā appaṭikūlā honti. evaṃ subhanteva adhimutto hotīti vimokkho''ti (paṭi0 ma0 1.212) vuttaṃ.

[03] ^b^sabbaso rūpasaññāna^eb^ntiādīsu yaṃ vattabbaṃ, taṃ visuddhimagge (visuddhi0 1.276-277) vuttameva. ^b^ayaṃ aṭṭhamo vimokkho^eb^ti ayaṃ catunnaṃ khandhānaṃ sabbaso vissaṭṭhattā vimuttattā aṭṭhamo uttamo vimokkho nāma.
[03] 67-68^b^.^eb^ sattame ^a^V3.0245^ea^ ^b^anariyavohārā^eb^ti na ariyakathā sadosakathā. yāhi cetanāhi te vohāre voharanti, tāsaṃ etaṃ nāmaṃ. aṭṭhame vuttapaṭipakkhanayena attho veditabbo.

[03] 69^b^.^eb^ navame ^b^khattiyaparisā^eb^ti khattiyānaṃ parisānaṃ sannipāto samāgamo. esa nayo sabbattha. ^b^anekasataṃ khattiyaparisa^eb^nti bimbisārasamāgama-ñātisamāgama-licchavisamāgamādisadisaṃ, aññesu cakkavāḷesupi labbhateva. ^b^sallapitapubba^eb^nti ālāpasallāpo katapubbo. ^b^sākacchā^eb^ti dhammasākacchāpi samāpajjitapubbā. ^b^yādisako tesaṃ vaṇṇo^eb^ti te odātāpi honti kāḷāpi maṅguracchavīpi, satthā suvaṇṇavaṇṇo. idaṃ pana saṇṭhānaṃ paṭicca ^a^P4.0148^ea^ kathitaṃ. saṇṭhānampi ca kevalaṃ tesaṃ paññāyatiyeva. na pana bhagavā milakkhasadiso hoti, nāpi āmuttamaṇikuṇḍalo, buddhaveseneva nisīdati. tepi attano samānasaṇṭhānameva passanti. ^b^yādisako tesaṃ saro^eb^ti te chinnassarāpi honti gaggassarāpi kākassarāpi, satthā brahmassarova. idaṃ pana bhāsantaraṃ sandhāya kathitaṃ. sacepi hi satthā rājāsane nisinno katheti, ``ajja rājā madhurena kathetī''ti nesaṃ hoti. kathetvā pakkante pana bhagavati puna rājānaṃ āgataṃ disvā ``ko nu kho aya''nti vīmaṃsā uppajjati. tattha ^b^ko nu kho aya^eb^nti ``imasmiṃ ṭhāne idāneva māgadhabhāsāya sīhaḷabhāsāya madhurena ākārena kathento ko nu kho ayaṃ antarahito, kiṃ devo udāhu ^a^M3.0247^ea^ manusso''ti evaṃ vīmaṃsantāpi na jānantīti attho. kimatthaṃ panevaṃ ajānantānaṃ dhammaṃ desetīti? vāsanatthāya. evaṃ sutopi hi dhammo anāgate paccayo hotīti anāgataṃ paṭicca deseti. ^b^anekasataṃ brāhmaṇaparisa^eb^ntiādinaṃ soṇadaṇḍasamāgamādivasena ceva aññacakkavāḷavasena ca sambhavo veditabbo.

[03] 70^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^nisīdana^eb^nti idha cammakhaṇḍaṃ adhippetaṃ. ^b^udenaṃ cetiya^eb^nti udenayakkhassa vasanaṭṭhāne katavihāro vuccati. ^b^gotamakā^eb^dīsupi eseva nayo. ^b^bhāvitā^eb^ti vaḍḍhitā. ^b^bahulīkatā^eb^ti ^a^V3.0246^ea^ punappunaṃ katā. ^b^yānīkatā^eb^ti ^a^P4.0149^ea^ yuttayānaṃ viya katā. ^b^vatthukatā^eb^ti patiṭṭhānaṭṭhena vatthu viya katā. ^b^anuṭṭhitā^eb^ti adhiṭṭhitā. ^b^paricitā^eb^ti samantato citā suvaḍḍhitā. ^b^susamāraddhā^eb^ti suṭṭhu samāraddhā.

[03] iti aniyamena kathetvā puna niyametvā dassento ^b^tathāgatassa kho^eb^tiādimāha. ettha ^b^kappa^eb^nti āyukappaṃ. tasmiṃ tasmiṃ kāle yaṃ manussānaṃ āyuppamāṇaṃ, taṃ paripuṇṇaṃ karonto tiṭṭheyya. ^b^kappāvasesaṃ vā^eb^ti ``appaṃ vā bhiyyo''ti vuttavassasatato atirekaṃ vā. mahāsīvatthero panāha -- ``buddhānaṃ aṭṭhāne gajjitaṃ nāma natthi, punappunaṃ samāpajjitvā maraṇantikavedanaṃ vikkhambhento bhaddakappameva tiṭṭheyya. kasmā pana na ṭhitoti? upādinnakasarīraṃ nāma khaṇḍiccādīhi abhibhuyyati, buddhā ca khaṇḍiccādibhāvaṃ appatvā pañcame āyukoṭṭhāse bahujanassa piyamanāpakāleyeva parinibbāyanti. buddhānubuddhesu ca mahāsāvakesu parinibbutesu ekakeneva khāṇukena viya ṭhātabbaṃ hoti daharasāmaṇeraparivārena vā, tato `aho buddhānaṃ parisā'ti hīḷetabbataṃ āpajjeyya. tasmā na ṭhito''ti. evaṃ vuttepi yo pana vuccati ``āyukappo''ti, idameva aṭṭhakathāya niyāmitaṃ.

[03] ^b^yathā taṃ mārena pariyuṭṭhitacitto^eb^ti ettha ^b^ta^eb^nti nipātamattaṃ, yathā mārena pariyuṭṭhitacitto ajjhotthaṭacitto aññopi koci puthujjano paṭivijjhituṃ na sakkuṇeyya, evameva ^a^P4.0150^ea^ nāsakkhi paṭivijjhitunti attho. māro hi ^a^M3.0248^ea^ yassa sabbena sabbaṃ dvādasa vipallāsā appahīnā, tassa cittaṃ pariyuṭṭhāti. therassa ca cattāro vipallāsā appahīnā, tenassa māro cittaṃ pariyuṭṭhāsi. so pana cittapariyuṭṭhānaṃ karonto kiṃ karotīti? bheravaṃ rūpārammaṇaṃ vā dasseti, saddārammaṇaṃ vā sāveti. tato sattā taṃ disvā vā sutvā vā satiṃ vissajjetvā vivaṭamukhā honti, tesaṃ mukhena hatthaṃ pavesetvā hadayaṃ maddati, tato visaññāva hutvā tiṭṭhanti. therassa panesa mukhe hatthaṃ pavesetuṃ kiṃ sakkhissati, bheravārammaṇaṃ pana dassesi. taṃ disvā thero nimittobhāsaṃ nappaṭivijjhi. bhagavā jānantoyeva kimatthaṃ yāva tatiyaṃ āmantesīti? parato ``tiṭṭhatu, bhante bhagavā''ti yācite ``tuyhevetaṃ dukkaṭaṃ, tuyhevetaṃ aparaddha''nti dosāropanena so katanukaraṇatthaṃ.

[03] ^b^māro pāpimā^eb^ti ettha satte anatthe niyojento māretīti ^b^māro. pāpimā^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ ^a^V3.0247^ea^. so hi pāpadhammasamannāgatattā ``pāpimā''ti vuccati. kaṇho, antako, namuci, pamattabandhūtipi tasseva nāmāni. ^b^bhāsitā kho panesā^eb^ti ayañhi bhagavato sambodhipattiyā aṭṭhame sattāhe bodhimaṇḍeyeva āgantvā ``bhagavā yadatthaṃ tumhehi pāramiyo pūritā, so vo attho anuppatto, paṭividdhaṃ sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ, kiṃ te lokavicāraṇenā''ti vatvā yathā ajja, evameva ``parinibbātu dāni, bhante bhagavā''ti yāci. bhagavā cassa ``na tāvāha''ntiādīni vatvā paṭikkhipi. taṃ sandhāya -- ``bhāsitā kho panesā, bhante''tiādimāha.

[03] tattha ^a^P4.0151^ea^ ^b^viyattā^eb^ti maggavasena byattā, tatheva ^b^vinītā,^eb^ tathā ^b^visāradā. bahussutā^eb^ti tepiṭakavasena bahu sutaṃ etesanti ^b^bahussutā^eb^. tameva dhammaṃ dhārentīti ^b^dhammadharā^eb^. atha vā pariyattibahussutā ceva paṭivedhabahussutā ca. pariyattipaṭivedhadhammānaṃyeva dhāraṇato dhammadharāti evamettha attho daṭṭhabbo. ^b^dhammānudhammappaṭipannā^eb^ti ariyadhammassa anudhammabhūtaṃ vipassanādhammaṃ paṭipannā. ^b^sāmīcippaṭipannā^eb^ti anucchavikapaṭipadaṃ paṭipannā. ^b^anudhammacārino^eb^ti anudhammaṃ caraṇasīlā. ^b^sakaṃ ācariyaka^eb^nti attano ācariyavādaṃ. ^b^ācikkhissantī^eb^tiādīni sabbāni aññamaññavevacanāni. ^b^sahadhammenā^eb^ti sahetukena sakāraṇena vacanena. ^b^sappāṭihāriya^eb^nti yāva niyyānikaṃ katvā dhammaṃ desessanti.

[03] ^b^brahmacariya^eb^nti ^a^M3.0249^ea^ sikkhāttayasaṅgahitaṃ sakalaṃ sāsanabrahmacariyaṃ. ^b^iddha^eb^nti samiddhaṃ jhānassādavasena. ^b^phīta^eb^nti vuddhipattaṃ sabbapāliphullaṃ viya abhiññāsampattivasena. ^b^vitthārika^eb^nti vitthataṃ tasmiṃ tasmiṃ disābhāge patiṭṭhitavasena. ^b^bāhujañña^eb^nti ^a^P4.0152^ea^ bahūhi ñātaṃ paṭividdhaṃ mahājanābhisamayavasena. ^b^puthubhūta^eb^nti sabbākārena puthulabhāvappattaṃ. kathaṃ? ^b^yāva devamanussehi suppakāsita^eb^nti, yattakā viññujātikā devā ceva manussā ca atthi, sabbehi suṭṭhu pakāsitanti attho. ^b^appossukko^eb^ti nirālayo. tvañhi pāpima aṭṭhamasattāhato paṭṭhāya ``parinibbātu dāni, bhante bhagavā, parinibbātu sugato''ti viravanto āhiṇḍittha. ajja dāni paṭṭhāya vigatussāho hohi, mā mayhaṃ parinibbānatthaṃ vāyāmaṃ karohīti vadati.

[03] ^b^sato sampajāno āyusaṅkhāraṃ ossajjī^eb^ti satiṃ sūpaṭṭhitaṃ katvā ñāṇena paricchinditvā āyusaṅkhāraṃ vissajji pajahi. tattha na bhagavā hatthena leḍḍuṃ viya āyusaṅkhāraṃ ossaji, temāsamattameva ^a^V3.0248^ea^ pana phalasamāpattiṃ samāpajjitvā tato paraṃ na samāpajjissāmīti cittaṃ uppādesi. taṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ ``ossajī''ti. ussajītipi pāṭho. ^b^mahābhūmicālo^eb^ti mahanto pathavīkampo. tadā kira dasasahassī lokadhātu kampittha. ^b^bhiṃsanako^eb^ti bhayajanako. ^b^devadundubhiyo ca phaliṃsū^eb^ti devabheriyo phaliṃsu, devo sukkhagajjitaṃ gajji, akālavijjulatā nicchariṃsu, khaṇikavassaṃ vassīti vuttaṃ hoti.

[03] ^b^udānaṃ udānesī^eb^ti kasmā udānesi? koci nāma vadeyya ``bhagavā pacchato pacchato anubandhitvā `parinibbātu, bhante'ti upadduto bhayena āyusaṅkhāraṃ vissajjesī''ti, tassokāso ^a^P4.0153^ea^ mā hotu, bhītassa hi udānaṃ nāma natthīti pītivegavissaṭṭhaṃ udānaṃ udānesi.

[03] tattha sabbesaṃ soṇasiṅgālādīnampi paccakkhabhāvato tulitaṃ paricchinnanti ^b^tulaṃ^eb^. kiṃ taṃ? kāmāvacarakammaṃ. na tulaṃ, na vā tulaṃ sadisamassa aññaṃ lokiyaṃ kammaṃ atthīti ^b^atulaṃ^eb^. kiṃ taṃ? mahaggatakammaṃ. atha vā kāmāvacaraṃ rūpāvacaraṃ tulaṃ, arūpāvacaraṃ atulaṃ. appavipākaṃ vā tulaṃ, bahuvipākaṃ atulaṃ. ^b^sambhava^eb^nti sambhavahetubhūtaṃ, rāsikārakaṃ piṇḍakārakanti ^a^M3.0250^ea^ attho. ^b^bhavasaṅkhāra^eb^nti punabbhavasaṅkhāraṇakaṃ. ^b^avassajī^eb^ti vissajjesi. ^b^munī^eb^ti buddhamuni. ^b^ajjhattarato^eb^ti niyakajjhattarato. ^b^samāhito^eb^ti upacārappanāsamādhivasena samāhito. ^b^abhindi kavacamivā^eb^ti kavacaṃ viya abhindi. ^b^attasambhava^eb^nti attani sañjātaṃ kilesaṃ. idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti -- savipākaṭṭhena sambhavaṃ, bhavābhisaṅkharaṇaṭṭhena bhavasaṅkhāranti ca laddhanāmaṃ tulātulasaṅkhātaṃ lokiyakammañca ossaji, saṅgāmasīse ^a^P4.0154^ea^ mahāyodho kavacaṃ viya attasambhavaṃ kilesañca ajjhattarato hutvā samāhito hutvā abhindīti.

[03] atha vā ^b^tula^eb^nti tulento tīrento. ^b^atulañca sambhava^eb^nti nibbānañceva sambhavañca. ^b^bhavasaṅkhāra^eb^nti bhavagāmikammaṃ. ^b^avassaji munī^eb^ti ``pañcakkhandhā aniccā, pañcannaṃ khandhānaṃ nirodho nibbānaṃ nicca''ntiādinā (paṭi0 ma0 3.37-38) nayena tulayanto buddhamuni bhave ādīnavaṃ, nibbāne ca ānisaṃsaṃ disvā taṃ khandhānaṃ mūlabhūtaṃ bhavasaṅkhāraṃ kammaṃ ``kammakkhayāya saṃvattatī''ti (ma0 ni0 2.81; a0 ni0 4.232-233) evaṃ vuttena kammakkhayakarena ariyamaggena avassaji. kathaṃ? ^b^ajjhattarato samāhito, abhindi kavacamivattasambhavaṃ^eb^. so hi vipassanāvasena ajjhattarato, samathavasena samāhitoti evaṃ pubbabhāgato paṭṭhāya ^a^V3.0249^ea^ samathavipassanābalena kavacamiva attabhāvaṃ pariyonandhitvā ṭhitaṃ, attani sambhavattā ``attasambhava''nti laddhanāmaṃ sabbakilesajālaṃ abhindi. kilesābhāvena ca kataṃ kammaṃ appaṭisandhikattā avassaṭṭhaṃ nāma hotīti evaṃ kilesappahānena kammaṃ pajahi. pahīnakilesassa ca bhayaṃ nāma natthi, tasmā abhītova āyusaṅkhāraṃ ossajji, abhītabhāvañāpanatthañca udānaṃ udānesīti veditabbo.

[03] ^b^yaṃ mahāvātā^eb^ti yena samayena yasmiṃ vā samaye mahāvātā. ^b^vāyantī^eb^ti upakkhepakavātā nāma ^a^P4.0155^ea^ uṭṭhahanti, te vāyantā saṭṭhisahassādhikanavayojanasatasahassabahalaṃ udakasandhārakavātaṃ upacchindanti, tato ākāse udakaṃ bhassati, tasmiṃ bhassante pathavī bhassati, puna vāto attano balena antodhammakaraṇe viya udakaṃ ābandhitvā gaṇhāti, tato udakaṃ uggacchati, tasmiṃ uggacchante pathavī uggacchati. evaṃ udakaṃ kampitaṃ ^a^M3.0251^ea^ pathaviṃ kampeti. etañca kampanaṃ yāvajjakālāpi hotiyeva, bahubhāvena pana ogacchanuggacchanaṃ na paññāyati.

[03] ^b^mahiddhikā mahānubhāvā^eb^ti ijjhanassa mahantatāya mahiddhikā, anubhavitabbassa mahantatāya mahānubhāvā. ^b^parittā^eb^ti dubbalā. ^b^appamāṇā^eb^ti balavā. ^b^so imaṃ pathaviṃ kampetī^eb^ti so iddhiṃ nibbattetvā saṃvejento mahāmoggallāno viya, vīmaṃsanto vā mahānāgattherassa bhāgineyyo saṅgharakkhitasāmaṇero viya pathaviṃ kampeti. ^b^saṅkampetī^eb^ti samantato kampeti. ^b^sampakampetī^eb^ti tasseva vevacanaṃ. iti imesu aṭṭhasu pathavikampesu paṭhamo dhātukopena, dutiyo iddhānubhāvena, tatiyacatutthā puññatejena, pañcamo ñāṇatejena, chaṭṭho sādhukāradānavasena, sattamo kāruññasabhāvena, aṭṭhamo ārodanena. mātukucchiṃ okkamante ca tato nikkhamante ca mahāsatte tassa puññatejena pathavī akampittha, abhisambodhiyaṃ ñāṇatejābhihatā hutvā akampittha, dhammacakkappavattane sādhukārabhāvasaṇṭhitā sādhukāraṃ dadamānā akampittha, āyusaṅkhāraossajjane ^a^P4.0156^ea^ kāruññasabhāvasaṇṭhitā cittasaṅkhobhaṃ asahamānā akampittha, parinibbāne ārodanavegatunnā hutvā akampittha. ayaṃ panattho pathavidevatāya vasena veditabbo. mahābhūtapathaviyā panetaṃ natthi acetanattā. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānatthamevāti.
[06] bhūmicālavaggo sattamo.

[03] 71-72^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhamassa ^a^V3.0250^ea^ paṭhame ^b^no ca sīlavā^eb^ti na sīlesu paripūrakārī. ^b^samantapāsādiko^eb^ti samantato pasādajanako. ^b^sabbākāraparipūro^eb^ti sabbehi samaṇākārehi samaṇadhammakoṭṭhāsehi paripūro. dutiye ^b^santā^eb^ti paccanīkasantatāya santā. ^b^vimokkhā^eb^ti paccanīkadhammehi vimuttattā ca vimokkhā.

[03] 73-79^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^a^M3.0252^ea^ ^b^bhāvetha no^eb^ti bhāvetha nu. ^b^sāsana^eb^nti anusiṭṭhi. ^b^āsavānaṃ khayāyā^eb^ti arahattaphalatthāya. catutthe ^b^patihitāyā^eb^ti paṭipannāya. ^b^so mamassa antarāyo^eb^ti so mama jīvitantarāyopi, puthujjanakālakiriyaṃ karontassa saggantarāyopi maggantarāyopi assa. ^b^satthakā vā me vātā^eb^ti satthaṃ viya aṅgamaṅgāni kantantīti satthakā. pañcamādīni vuttanayāneva. navame ^b^saṃsaggārāmatā^eb^ti pañcavidhe saṃsagge ārāmatā.

[03] 80^b^.^eb^ dasame ^a^P4.0157^ea^ ^b^kusītavatthūnī^eb^ti kusītassa alasassa vatthūni patiṭṭhā, kosajjakāraṇānīti attho. ^b^kammaṃ kattabbaṃ hotī^eb^ti cīvaravicāraṇādikammaṃ kattabbaṃ hoti. ^b^na vīriyaṃ ārabhatī^eb^ti duvidhampi vīriyaṃ nārabhati. ^b^appattassā^eb^ti jhānavipassanāmaggaphaladhammassa appattassa pattiyā. ^b^anadhigatassā^eb^ti tasseva anadhigatassa adhigamatthāya. ^b^asacchikatassā^eb^ti tadeva asacchikatassa sacchikaraṇatthāya. ^b^idaṃ paṭhama^eb^nti idaṃ ``handāhaṃ nipajjāmī''ti evaṃ osīdanaṃ paṭhamaṃ kusītavatthu. iminā nayena sabbattha attho veditabbo. ^b^māsācitakaṃ maññe^eb^ti ettha pana māsācitaṃ nāma tintamāso. yathā tintamāso garuko hoti, evaṃ garukoti adhippāyo ^a^V3.0251^ea^. ^b^gilānā vuṭṭhito hotī^eb^ti gilāno hutvā pacchā vuṭṭhito hoti. ^b^ārambhavatthūnī^eb^ti vīriyakāraṇāni. tesampi imināva nayena attho veditabbo. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
[06] yamakavaggo aṭṭhamo.

[03] 81-82^b^.^eb^ navamassa paṭhamaṃ heṭṭhā vuttanayameva. dutiye ^b^saddho^eb^ti duvidhāya saddhāya samannāgato. ^b^no cupasaṅkamitā^eb^ti na upaṭṭhahati. ^b^no^eb^ ^a^M3.0253^ea^ ^b^ca paripucchitā^eb^ti atthānatthaṃ kāraṇākāraṇaṃ paripucchitā na hoti. ^b^samannāgato^eb^ti ^a^P4.0158^ea^ sāmiatthe paccattaṃ, samannāgatassāti vuttaṃ hoti. ^b^ekantapaṭibhānā tathāgataṃ dhammadesanā hotī^eb^ti tathāgatassa ekantapaṭibhānā dhammadesanā hoti, ekanteneva paṭibhāti upaṭṭhātīti attho.

[03] 83^b^.^eb^ tatiye ^b^sabbe dhammā^eb^ti pañcakkhandhā. ^b^chandamūlakā^eb^ti ajjhāsayacchando kattukamyatāchando taṃ mūlaṃ etesanti chandamūlakā. manasikārato sambhavantīti ^b^manasikārasambhavā^eb^. phassato samudenti rāsī bhavantīti ^b^phassasamudayā^eb^. vedanāya samosarantīti ^b^vedanāsamosaraṇā^eb^. samādhi etesaṃ pamukhoti ^b^samādhippamukhā^eb^. jeṭṭhakaṭṭhena sati adhipati etesanti ^b^satādhipateyyā,^eb^ satijeṭṭhakāti attho. paññā uttarā etesanti ^b^paññuttarā^eb^. vimutti eva sāro etesanti ^b^vimuttisārā^eb^. ettha ca chandamūlakādayo cattāropi lokiyā kathitā, sesā lokiyalokuttaramissakāti.

[03] 84^b^.^eb^ catutthe ^a^V3.0252^ea^ ^b^mahācoro^eb^ti rajjantare dubbhituṃ samattho mahācoro. ^b^pariyāpajjatī^eb^ti pariyādānaṃ gacchati. ^b^na ciraṭṭhitiko hotī^eb^ti addhānaṃ pālento ṭhātuṃ na sakkoti. ^b^appaharantassa paharatī^eb^ti attano averine appaharante guṇasampanne ca mahallake ca taruṇadārake ca appaharitabbayuttake paharati. ^b^anavasesaṃ ādiyatī^eb^ti nissesaṃ gaṇhāti. byattacorānañhi idaṃ vattaṃ -- parassa dvīsu sāṭakesu eko gahetabbo, ekasmiṃ sante dubbalaṃ datvā thiro gahetabbo. puṭabhattataṇḍulādīsu ekaṃ koṭṭhāsaṃ datvā eko gahetabboti. ^b^accāsanne kammaṃ karotī^eb^ti gāmanigamarājadhānīnaṃ āsannaṭṭhāne corikakammaṃ karoti. ^b^na ca nidhānakusalo hotī^eb^ti yaṃ laddhaṃ, taṃ dakkhiṇeyye nidahituṃ cheko na hoti, paralokamaggaṃ na sodheti.

[03] 85^b^.^eb^ pañcame ^a^M3.0254^ea^ ^a^P4.0159^ea^ ^b^yaṃ samaṇenā^eb^ti yaṃ guṇajātaṃ samaṇena pattabbaṃ. ^b^vusīmatā^eb^ti brahmacariyavāsaṃvutena. ^b^mutto mocemi bandhanā^eb^ti ahaṃ sabbabandhanehi mutto hutvā mahājanampi rāgādibandhanato mocemi. ^b^paramadanto^eb^ti aññena kenaci asikkhāpito acodito sayambhuñāṇena paṭivijjhitvā paramadamathena dantattā paramadanto nāma. ^b^parinibbuto^eb^ti kilesaparinibbānena parinibbuto.

[03] 86^b^.^eb^ chaṭṭhe ^b^mā ca mayā yaso^eb^ti yaso ca mayā saddhiṃ mā gañchi. ^b^akasiralābhī^eb^ti vipulalābhī. ^b^sīlapaññāṇa^eb^nti sīlañceva ñāṇañca. ^b^saṅgammā^eb^ti sannipatitvā. ^b^samāgammā^eb^ti samāgantvā. ^b^saṅgaṇikavihāra^eb^nti gaṇasaṅgaṇikavihāraṃ. ^b^na hi nūname^eb^ti na hi nūna ime. ^b^tathā hi paname^eb^ti tathā hi pana ime. ^b^aṅgulipatodakehī^eb^ti aṅgulipatodayaṭṭhiṃ katvā vijjhanena. ^b^sañjagghante^eb^ti mahāhasitaṃ hasante. ^b^saṃkīḷante^eb^ti keḷiṃ karonte.

[03] 87^b^.^eb^ sattame ^a^V3.0253^ea^ ^b^nikkujjeyyā^eb^ti tena dinnassa deyyadhammassa appaṭiggahaṇatthaṃ pattanikkujjanakammavācāya nikujjeyya, na adhomukhaṭhapanena. ^b^alābhāyā^eb^ti ^a^P4.0160^ea^ catunnaṃ paccayānaṃ alābhatthāya. ^b^anatthāyā^eb^ti upaddavāya avaḍḍhiyā. ^b^ukkujjeyyā^eb^ti ukkujjanakammavācāya ukkujjeyya.

[03] 88^b^.^eb^ aṭṭhame ^b^appasādaṃ pavedeyyu^eb^nti appasannabhāvaṃ jānāpeyyuṃ. appasādaṃ pavedentena pana kiṃ kātabbanti? nisinnāsanato na uṭṭhātabbaṃ na vanditabbaṃ na paccuggamanaṃ kātabbaṃ, na deyyadhammo dātabbo. ^b^agocare^eb^ti pañcavidhe agocare.

[03] 89^b^.^eb^ navame ^a^M3.0255^ea^ ^b^dhammikañca gihipaṭissava^eb^nti ``imaṃ temāsaṃ idheva vasitabba''nti vutto ``evaṃ hotū''tiādinā nayena paṭissavaṃ. ^b^na saccāpetī^eb^ti vuttaṃ na saccaṃ karoti visaṃvādeti.

[03] 90^b^.^eb^ dasame ^b^paccekaṭṭhāne^eb^ti adhipatiṭṭhāne jeṭṭhakaṭṭhāne. tañhi jeṭṭhakaṃ katvā kiñci saṅghakammaṃ kātuṃ na labhati. ^b^na ca tena mūlena vuṭṭhāpetabbo^eb^ti taṃ mūlaṃ katvā abbhānakammaṃ kātuṃ na labhati. sesaṃ sabbattha uttānamevāti.
[06] sativaggo navamo.
